Visionstatement_Desc: Njcians Demonstrate Loyalty With Integrity; Scholarship With Creativity; Leadership With Sensitivity
Missionstatement_Desc: College Of The Nation: Home Of Scholars And Leaders Who Serve With Honour
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: We Seek To Create A Joyful And Lively Learning Community For Students And Staff. Every Njcian Will Leave With A Distinctive And Memorable Experience. They Will Learn To Serve With Honour| To Be Loyal To Family And Singapore| To Be Leaders Sensitive To The Needs Of Others| And To Be Creative In Their Approach To Solving Problems. They Would Have Imbibed The Values Of Civility| Altruism| Resilience And Enterprise.
Special_Sdp_Offered: For The Integrated Programme (Junior High)| We Offer Language Arts (English & Literature)| Chemistry| Physics| Biology| Governance & Society| Mathematics (Both E And A Maths)| History| Geography| Higher Mother Tongue And Mother Tongue For The First 4 Years| As Well As Integrated Sciences| Thinking| And General Arts Programme (Art And Music) For The First 2 Years. Advanced Language Arts| Advanced Humanities And Man & Ideas Are Also Offered To Capable Students At Jh3 & Jh4. The College Offers A Wide Range Of Special Programmes In Various Domains. They Are: Spire (Special Programme In Inquiry And Research)| Research@Njc| Accelerated Mathematics| Advanced Sciences| Art Elective Programme (Aep)| Njc Music Programme| Enhanced Boarding Programme| Leadership|  Values-In-Action| Guidance Programmes| Humanities Scholarship Programme| Sapphire Programme And International Programmes.  Students May Also Offer A Third Language Outside Of College. Junior High 1 Students Undergo A Special Cca Programme Known As Cafe| Where Students Will Attend One Sports Or Performing Arts Cca In Term 1 And Another In Term 2 Before Deciding Which Cca To Join For The Rest Of The Jh (Sec) Years. Students May Also Join Any Cca Under The Talent Management Scheme.  Note That H1| H2 And H3 Subjects Listed Are Only Offered At Senior High (Jc Years).

Visionstatement_Desc: An Institute Of Distinction| A Dynamic Learning Culture|  A Caring Tjc Family
Missionstatement_Desc: Broaden Minds| Touch Hearts| Enrich Lives
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Every Tjcian Is Nurtured To Be A Trailblazer With A Heart. Mindful Of Tradition| Roused By Imagination And Fuelled By Ambition| Tjcians Are Active Learners| Caring And Committed Citizens And Ethical Leaders. Our Holistic Brand Of Temasek Excellence Equips Students With Intellectual| Moral And Social Capital To Thrive In A  Fast-Changing And Complex World. The College Achieved The School Distinction Award In 2015| With Best Practices For Teaching & Learning| Student All-Round Development| Staff Well-Being And Development| Character And Citizenship Education As Well As Partnership. Our Dynamic Staff Fraternity Continuously Innovate And Hone Our Craft| As We Guide Our Students To Bring Out The Best In Them. The Motto We Proudly Serve Is 'For College| For Nation'.
Special_Sdp_Offered: The Tjc 6-Year Integrated Programme Provides A Seamless Progression Of Learning| Empowering Students Beyond The Basics By Exposing Them To Both Breadth And Depth Of Knowledge| Leading Up To The Gce A-Level Examination In Year 6. The Design Of The 6-Year Ip Curriculum Supports Integrative And Interdisciplinary Learning| Extending 'Beyond Basics' Through The Core Curriculum| 'Beyond Boundaries' Through Extended Learning And 'Beyond Self' Through Student Development. It Aims At Achieving 'Temasek Excellence'| Engendering In Students Greatness In Intellect| Character And Leadership. Ip Students Have A Plethora Of Programmes To Whet Their Appetites. Beginning From Ip1| The Temasek Academy Unbound Programme Develops Talented Students In Areas Of Mathematics| Sciences And English. Students Participate In A Variety Of Workshops| Talks And Seminars Conducted By Experts In Relevant Fields. Moreover| There Are Signature Ip Programmes Such As Those For Special Talent Areas (Academic| Aesthetics| Sports)| World Without Borders| Wonder.Observe.Weave! Attachment To External Organisations| Ace Cce Programme And Temasek Leadership Showdown.  In Addition| There Are Elective Programmes - Music Elective Programme (Year 1 To 6)| Chinese Language Elective Programme (Year 3 To 6) And Humanities Programme (Year 3 To 6) - Which Lead Outstanding Students To The Moe Scholarships At Year 5.

Visionstatement_Desc: Empowering Our Students To Live With Passion And Lead With Compassion.
Missionstatement_Desc: We Nurture Leaders In Research| Industry And Government To Serve Our Nation.
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Hwa Chong Institution'S (Hci) Mission Is To Nurture Leaders For The Nation: Leaders With A Heart To Serve The Community.  To Date| Hci Has Produced 56 President'S Scholars.  Indeed| Hwa Chong Is More Than A School That Produces Top Scholars. We Also Want Our Students To Embrace The Values Of Hard Work| Integrity| Passion| And Compassion.  All Our Students Receive A Sustained Character Education Which Encourages Them To Work With The Community Through Local And Global Service-Learning Initiatives.  At Hwa Chong| Students Approach Life With Passion. The School Provides A Caring Environment That Is Intellectually Stimulating| Secure| And Joyful. It Offers A Curiosity-Driven 6-Year Integrated Programme (Ip). Drawing From The Best Of East And West| Hci Has An Extensive Global Network That Links Our Students To Leading Universities And Industry Partners. Working Closely With Industry Captains And Professors| Students Are Encouraged To Pursue Multidisciplinary Interests.  Each Year| Our Students Go On To Leading Institutions For Their Undergraduate Study| With A Strong Entry To Some Of The World'S Best Universities.  All Hwa Chong Students Are Also Committed To Serving Society.  Hwa Chong Prides Itself On Grooming Servant Leaders Who Display Civic Responsibility And Empathy.  Annually| Hwa Chong Students Provide Support And Companionship To The Underprivileged. Beyond Offering Assistance| Many Have Partnered Key Welfare Organisations To Helm Innovative Values-In-Action Projects.  As Active Contributors To Civil Society| Hwa Chong Students Have Reached Out To Communities| Both Locally  And  Overseas| Through Various Student-Led Projects. These Projects Often Mark The Beginning Of A Long-Term Commitment Of Service To The Community.
Special_Sdp_Offered: Moe   Humanities  Programme|  Moe Art Elective Programme| Moe  Bicultural Studies Programme| Moe Language Elective Programme (Chinese)|   Hwa  Chong Talent  Development Programmes - Science & Math Talent| School-Based Gifted Education| Ong Teng Cheong Leadership| Gifted And Talented Education| Entrepreneurial Leadership Boarding| Arts & Sports| Global Outreach| Week-Long Sabbaticals|  Service Learning| Malay Special Programme| Future Problem Solving| Advanced Science Research  (Including  Biomedical|  Biotechnology And Bioengineering| Defence Science| Environmental Engineering| Nanotechnology| Material Science| Interactive  Digital  Media  & Electronics)| Hwa Chong-Beijing Satellite Campus| Xi'An And Wuxi Winter Campuses. Collaborations With Overseas Institutions Of Learning| E.G. Staples High School.

Visionstatement_Desc: Future Leaders| Concerned Citizens
Missionstatement_Desc: Developing Our Students Holistically In A Vibrant And Caring Environment
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Bpps Firmly Believes That Every Child Is A Unique Individual With The Potential To Become Self-Directed Learner Grounded In The School'S Values Of Respect| Responsibility| Resilience| Gratitude| Integrity And Compassion. We Strive To Provide A Secure| Caring And Innovative Learning Environment That Embraces The Spirit Of Enterprise With The Courage To Take Calculated Risk.   In The Academic Domain| We Are Committed To Providing Student-Centric Learning Experiences That Cultivate Thinking And Promote Independent Learning In Our Students.  By Purposefully Engaging Our Students To 'Think Out Of The Box"| We Imbue In Them The Courage To Go Beyond Their Comfort Zone. We Constantly Review Our Programmes To Ensure That They Remain Relevant| Diverse And Robust To Meet The Demands Of The Educational Landscape And Cater To Our Students' Needs.   Our Student Development Programmes Focuses On Inculcation Of The School Values And Aims To Create Opportunities For Our Students To Discover Their Talents| Build Their Confidence And Master 21St Century Competencies. We Offer A Plethora Of Activities Such As Level Camps| Student Leadership Courses And Values In Action Programmes.    Recognising The Importance Of Staff Capacity As The Key Driver To Realise Our School'S Vision And Mission| We Place Strong Emphasis On Staff Training And Development. Besides Formal Training| We Also Strive To Create A Collaborative Learning Culture Through Level Sharing| Professional Learning Communities And Focused Group Discussion.
Special_Sdp_Offered: Learning For Life Programme (Llp) -"I2Can Dance"  The 'I2 Can Dance!' Programme Aims To Foster Confidence| Resilience| Adaptability And Graciousness In Our Students. Our Students' Horizon Are Also Widened Through Increased Awareness Of The Different Cultures In Singapore And Beyond. Such Awareness Will Also Promote Better Understanding And Respect For The Different Ethnic Groups In Singapore  Through Their Participation In The Programme| Our Students Also Learnt The School Values Of Respect And Responsibility| Where They Are Taught To Respect The Dance Form And Fellow Dancers| To Be Responsible For Their Own Learning Of Dance As Well As To Know What Is Involved In Dance| For Instance Choreography| Technique| Costumes And Props.  The School Takes A Three-Pronged Approach To The I2Can Dance! Programme:  Experience - It Provides A Broad-Based Learning For All.   Empowerment - It Creates Opportunities For Our Pupils To Identify Their Interests And Talents And Also Reflect On Their Learning And Develop To Become Independent Learners Through Self-Assessment.  Enhancement And Excellence - It Provides An Enhanced Experience For Students Who Display Dance Potential. Talented Dancers Are Given A Platform To Enhance Their Skills And Develop Holistically Through Overseas Exchange Programmes.  Values In Action (Via) The Values In Action (Via) In Bpps Are Rich Learning Experiences To Inculcate Active Citizenship And Civic Responsibility Among Our Students. Via In Bpps Begins With Students Learning How To Care For Oneself And Progressively Spiral Up To Caring For The Local Community. While The Students Celebrate Their Achievements Of Carrying Out The Via Tasks| They Also Reflect On The Values They Have Put Into Practice.  At The End Of Six Years In Bpps| We Believe That With The Experiences That Our Students Have Gone Through| They Would Be Socially Responsible Citizens Who Contribute Meaningfully To The Community.

Visionstatement_Desc: Leaders Of Character| Striving For Excellence In A Vibrant School
Missionstatement_Desc: To Nurture Self-Directed Learners And Critical And Creative Thinkers Who Lead And Serve With Integrity And Compassion.
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Established In 1951| Haig Girls' School (Hgs) Is An All-Girls' Government Primary School.  Our School Has A Heritage Of Excellent All-Round Education.  Nurturing Character| Leadership And Creativity Is The Hallmark Of An Education At Hgs That Has Endured Over The Decades. We Believe In Nurturing The Whole Child And Preparing Our Pupils For Life Through A Distinctive Learning Experience That Is Values-Based| Engaging| Rigorous And Innovative.   Our Shared Values Are Encapsulated In Our I4Cs: Integrity| Commitment| Concern| Cooperation| And Creativity. Guided By Our School Motto 'Ars Potens Est' ('Knowledge Is Power')| We Strive To Nurture Every Haig Girl To Use Her Knowledge| Skills And Talents In Service To The School| Community And Nation.   We Believe That Our Pupils Are Never Too Young To Make A Difference And Give Them A Voice Through Advocacy| Service| Creative Expression And Innovation.  Hgs Is A Second Home To Our Pupils - A Safe| Nurturing Environment For Them To Be Themselves And To Grow And Learn. We Believe In The Uniqueness And Worth Of Every Child - Each Child Is Different| Special And Talented In Her Own Way And We Seek To Bring Out The Best In Her. We Love| Value And Accept Each Child For Who She Is Regardless Of Her Results Or Achievements| But We Hold Her To High Expectations. In Hgs| We Would Like Each Child To Take Responsibility For Her Learning And Develop An Intrinsic Motivation To Learn| Grow And Excel. We Believe In A Growth Mindset -- With Effort| Perseverance And Resilience| Every Child Can Think| Learn| Achieve And Excel.
Special_Sdp_Offered: Llp - Character And Leadership Through Performing & Visual Arts: Our Whole-School Approach To The Arts Allows Pupils To Demonstrate Creativity| Express Themselves| Develop Character And Deepen Sense Of Pride In Our Multi-Cultural Heritage Through Diverse Learning Experiences In Art| Music| Drama And Dance. -Alp - Innovation & Service Learning Through Integrated Project Work: Ipw@Hgs Involves Inter-Disciplinary Place-Based Learning| Authentic Problem-Solving And Value Creation. Service Learning Is Embedded As Pupils Apply Knowledge And Skills To Address Civic Issues. They Collaborate To Create Solutions| Artworks Or Creative Writing| Acquiring 21St Century Competencies (21Cc) Such As Critical And Creative Thinking| Collaboration And Communication Skills. -The Inspired Museum Explorers| Our Unique Travels (Timeout): The Inter-Disciplinary Museum-Based Learning Programme Develops Visual Literacy| Nurtures Creative Thinking And Fosters A Sense Of Pride In Singapore'S Cultural Heritage. -Holistic Assessment (Ha) With Holistic Reporting And Parent-Child-Teacher Conferencing (Pctc): As Prototype School For Ha| We Adopt A Balanced Assessment System With Formative And Summative Assessment. Assessment Is Embedded Into Teaching And Enables Teachers To Provide Quality Feedback To Pupils And Deepen Their Learning In Various Domains Such As The Arts| Values| Leadership And 21Cc.  Pupils Own Their Learning Through Reflection And Self-Assessment| Taking The Lead At Pctc| To Share With Parents Their Progress And Areas For Growth.  -Discover| Develop & Dedicate Your Talent Time (D3T2): Talent Development Programmes In The Performing & Visual Arts| Sports| Mathematics| Science & Ict. -Teaching Through The Arts Programme (Ttap): Incorporating Drama And Movement In The Learning Of Math And Science -Knowledge Building: An Inquiry Approach To Science Learning. Pupils Work Together To Ask Questions| Test Hypotheses| Improve On Peers' Ideas And Co-Construct Scientific Understanding.

Visionstatement_Desc: A Future-Ready Community Of Passionate Learners  Anchored In Values And Striving For Excellence To Make A Positive Difference.
Missionstatement_Desc: Inspiring And Empowering Our Learners To Be Their Best For Self And Others Through A Supportive Environment And Innovative & Effective Teaching-Learning Practices.
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: At Teck Whye Primary| We Believe That All Children Can Learn And Want To Learn And That Teaching Needs To Cater To Different Progress Levels And Be Anchored On Meaningful Engagement. Every Child Can Be Inspired And Empowered To Achieve Within A Supportive Environment Anchored On Safety And Care. Teachers| As Role Models| Impart Sound Values| Build Character And Inspire Their Students To Learn By Building Quality Relationships With And Among Students. To Meet Future Challenges| Our Students Must Extend Their Learning Beyond The Acquisition Of Knowledge And Skills| And Apply And Use Their Learning In Meaningful Ways.  Established Since 1959| Teck Whye Primary Envisions Our Learners To Achieve The Following Outcomes And Exercise The Related Values In Their Daily Lives:   Confident Communicators Who Engage With Respect   Healthy Individuals Who Exercise Responsibility   Adaptive Leaders Who Collaborate With Integrity   Model Citizens Who Encourage Through Compassion   Passionate Learners Who Learn With Resilience The Rallying Call Is For Champs Who Embrace And Strive For The Value Of Excellence.  To Realise These Outcomes| The School Provides A Strong Grounding In The Various Subjects While Placing Emphasis On The (I) Acquisition Of 21St Century Competencies| (Ii) Development Of Effective Communication Skills And An Understanding Of Media Use And Production| (Iii) Inculcation Of Values And Social Emotional Development| (Iv) Understanding Of The Importance Of National Education And (V) Development Of Leadership Competencies.  The School| Therefore| Whilst Encouraging Our Students To Do Well Academically| Also Places A Very Strong Emphasis On Character And Holistic Development. We Believe That This Would Provide A Firm Foundation For Our Students As They Pursue Their Secondary Education But More Importantly As They Live Their Lives.
Special_Sdp_Offered: Teck Whye Primary'S Applied Learning Programme (Alp) Is Entitled 'Media Whiz Kids!'| A Media And Media Literacy-Based Programme. The Programme Aims To Enable Our Students To Apply The Knowledge And Skills Acquired In Languages| Technology| Art And Music To Authentic And Meaningful Contexts.  Specialised Media Programmes Will Support Those With Talents And A Keen Interest Through Our Various Ccas Such As The Infocomm Club| Idesign Club| And Speech And Drama Club. The Alp Is Intended To Develop Confident Students Who Can Put Across Their Thoughts And Ideas Verbally And In Written Form In Both Digital And Non-Digital Platforms| And Are Able To Harness Relevant Tools And Media To Enhance Communication. Programming To Promote Computational Thinking Will Also Be Introduced To Students As Part Of This Alp.  Our Learning For Life Programme (Llp)| Entitled 'I Lead| I Serve'| Is A Leadership Development Programme Which Adapts Kouzes And Posner'S Five Practices Of Exemplary Leadership To Guide The Development Of Leadership Competencies. Stories Will Be Used As A Primary Means To Raise Awareness Of Leadership Skills And Dilemmas. The Programme Is Centred On A Core Belief That Leadership Is About Service To Others And Students Will Be Involved In A Range Of Learning Experiences Which Will Vary In Complexity Depending On Their Ages And Leadership Roles.  The School'S Champ Programme Emphasises The Development Of Character And Students Will Have The Opportunity To Reflect And Act On The School Values. Parents Are Also Encouraged To Be Involved As Part Of This Programme.  Our Students Also Undergo A Variety Of Other Special Programmes As Part Of The School Curriculum. These Include Structured Arts Development From P1-6 Where They Will Learn About Musical Instruments Such As The Ukulele And Digital Keyboards| And Art Forms Such As Manga| Chinese Painting And Batik Painting. Sports Programmes Such As Tennis| Archery And Bowling Are Also Provided To Broaden Our Students' Experiences.

Visionstatement_Desc: A Vibrant Community Of Gracious Citizens And Passionate Learners
Missionstatement_Desc: We Nurture All-Rounded Pupils Of Grace| Distinction And Sound Moral Values|Ready To Take On Future Endeavours.
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: With A Strong Conviction That Children Are Small But Their Minds Are Not| Jurong Primary School (Jps) Provides A Holistic Education To Our Students Through A Variety Of Quality Programmes. Every Jps Student Is A Leader Who Demonstrates The 7 Habits Of The Leader In Me When Leading Self| Peer And School.  Through Platforms Like The Every Child Leads In Instrumental Performance (Eclip) Programme As Well As The Integrated Project Work (Ipw)| Jps Students Are Empowered With Leadership Competencies To Become Gracious Leaders And Passionate Learners.  Every Jps Teacher Is A Nurturing Educator Committed To Building A Culture Of Care And Excellence In The School.   Leveraging On Strategic Partnerships With Our Stakeholders| We Will Develop All-Rounded Students Of Distinction Ready To Take On Future Endeavours.
Special_Sdp_Offered: Jps Is Committed To Giving Each Child A Broad And Deep Foundation For A Lifelong Journey Of Learning.  Holistic Education Is About Nurturing The Whole Child| Developing In Our Children An Enduring Core Of Skills| Dispositions And Competencies| Steeped In Values And Character| To Enable Them To Thrive In The Future Workplace| And More Importantly| Lead Purposeful And Meaningful Lives.  Jps Has Been Awarded The Learning For Life Programme (Llp) Status In Music And Performing Arts With Our Special Programme Known As The Eclip (Every Child Leads In Instrumental Performance).  Through  This Programme| Not Only Will The Students Learn To Appreciate| Create And Love Music| But Also Develop In Them Other Competencies And Values In Life.   Through Music| We Strive Also To Build In All Our Students Leadership Competencies.  To This End| We Have Embarked On A Programme Called Leader In Me Programme Which Utilizes The 7 Habits Of Highly Effective People.  Our Overseas Immersion Programes Also Help Our Students To Sensitize Them To The World Around Them.

Visionstatement_Desc: A Child. An Explorer. A Friend.
Missionstatement_Desc: To Provide A Holistic Education To Develop Confident And Self-Directed Learners| Concerned Citizens And Active Contributors.
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: The School Dates Back To 1956 When Many Schools In The Neighbourhood Closed Due To Dwindling Enrolment And Their Students Were Moved To Queenstown Primary School (Qtps). The Current Qtps Was Formed Through A Merger Of Mei Chin Primary| Tanglin Primary And The Old Queenstown Primary In January 2002. The School Underwent Prime At The End Of November 1999 When The Old Buildings Were Demolished And Rebuilt On Site. This Is Then Followed By Peri Upgrading In 2010.  The School Believes That Every Child Matters And Can Accomplish. With This Belief| The School Endeavours To Develop  - A Child - A Confident And Happy Child; Motivated And Passionate About Learning. - An Explorer - One Who Embraces Challenges And Diversity| Possesses An Open Mind| And Dares To Try New Things. - A Friend - One Who Loves And Cares For His Family| Shows Care And Concern For The Less Privileged| The Community| The Environment And The Nation.  To Achieve This| The School Is Committed To Providing A Holistic Education To Develop Confident And Self-Directed Learners| Concerned Citizens And Active Contributors. This Process Is Guided By The School'S Values Of Questioning Mind| Quality Work| Perseverance| Positive Thinking| Sincerity And Self-Discipline For Both Students And Staff.
Special_Sdp_Offered: In Qtps| The Vision Of Our Character & Citizenship Education (Cce) Curriculum Is To Develop A Child Of Good Character And A Contributing Citizen. Good Character Is Defined In Two Parts: (1) Performance Character Refers To Having The Character That Enables The Child To Do His/ Her Best To Realise His/ Her Potential And (2) Moral Character Which Is To Do The Right Thing To Serve The Larger Community| And Not Just For Self. These Are Further Distilled To 4 Queenstowner Outcomes (Qtos) - Confident Individual| Critical Thinker| Caring Citizen And Effective Leader. To Effect Qto| The School Has Put In Place The Following:  Connecting The Hearts With Arts Curriculum - Our School'S Learning For Life Programme (Llp)  The Visual Arts Curriculum Aims To  - Engage And Equip Every Student With The Means To Express Himself| To Develop A Voice And A Sense Of Self-Worth. We Hope That Every Student Can Taste Success And Be Successful In Accomplishing Their Goals Through The Medium Of Visual Arts Through A 6-Year Progressive Curriculum. - Enrich Groups Of Students Who Are Interested Or Whose Interest In The Visual Arts Is Yet To Be Discovered. The 3 Art-Related Ccas Are Ceramics (2D Relief And 3D)| Chinese Brush Painting (2D) With Seal Carving (3D) And Photography. - Excel Is To Provide The Opportunity Within School To Help Students With Talent In The Visual Arts To Help Them To Excel And To Learn And Love The Visual Art Like An Artist. Artworks Produced By This Group Of Students Would Also Contribute To The Community Around Us Where Required.  Character & Citizenship Education The School Aims To Develop Cce Vision By Focusing On Fostering Positivity To Bring Out The Best In Each Child. This Is Done Through (A) Adopting The Restorative Approach In Managing Students' Behaviour; (B) School-Wide Initiative Of 'Caught Doing Right' Movement Where Students Are Commended For Their Good Behaviour During Morning Assembly And (C) Monthly Mass Birth-Month Celebration During Assembly.

Visionstatement_Desc: Learn With Passion Serve With Compassion Lead With Vision
Missionstatement_Desc: Maximizing Potential Through The Development Of Mind| Body And Soul
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Rosythians Are Grounded In The I-Care Values As We Develop Our Strengths And Competencies To Be 'Ready To Serve'.   We Aspire To Learn With Passion| Serve With Compassion And Lead With Vision.
Special_Sdp_Offered: The School Offers Distinctive Programmes In The Areas Of Science And The Aesthetics.  Under The Auspices Of The Applied Learning Programme (Alp) And Learning For Life Programme (Llp)| Students Go Through Level-Wide Activities To Broaden Their Learning In The Two Focused Areas.  Those With The Aptitude Or Interest May Also Progress To Our Customized Activities For More In-Depth Learning.  In The Area Of Science| For Instance| Students Go Through A Range Of Activities From Life-Sciences| Use Of Customized Gadgets To Investigate Scientific Concepts| To The Application Of Theories In The Design Of Toys.  Platforms Have Also Been Provided For Students To Apply Their Learning In The Creation Of Toys/Artefacts Using Science Concepts| Which Are Subsequently Sold To Raise Funds For Selected Beneficiaries.    With Regard To The Development Of Aesthetics| Students Are Exposed To Voice-Training| Dance| Playing Of Musical Instruments| To The Use Of Ict For Manga Art And 2D Animations.  Through The Programme| Students Are Exposed To An Array Of Alternative Platforms To Express Their Thoughts And Ideas.  It Is Hoped That Through The Wide Range Of Offerings And The Strong Foundation That Is Laid| Rosythians Will Acquire A Broad And Deep Foundation For A Lifelong And Life-Deep Learning.

Principal_Name: Mrs Leong- Tan Ling Ling Jenny
Visionstatement_Desc: A School Of Care And Distinction
Missionstatement_Desc: Nurturing Brightsparks With A Holistic & Inclusive Education
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: All Staff Are Committed And Mission-Driven To Provide A Quality Student-Centric| Values-Driven Education. Our Brightsparks Will Be Happy Students Who Look Forward To School And Are Motivated To Learn And Work With Their Peers.  Knowing Each Student And His Needs| The School Is Able To Equip Each Student With A Strong Foundation In Literacy And Numeracy And Help Each To Grow In Values| In Sports And In The Aesthetics.  Working In Close Partnership With The Parents And The Community| We Seek Their Support In Helping Us To Bring Out The Best In Our Students.
Special_Sdp_Offered: Learning For Life Programme (Llp)| Programme For Active Learning (Pal)| Swimsafer Programme| Math Enrichment Programmes  D'Aesthetics Programme| A Learning For Life Programme (Llp)| Aims To Provide Students With The Opportunity To Learn About And Experience The Arts. This Programme Helps To Cultivate Values Such As Perseverance| Self-Discipline And Appreciation To Help Students Achieve Success In School| Work And Life. This Programme Also Aims To Provide A Common Ground For Cross-Cultural Competencies To Be Developed As It Encourages Expressions And Contributes To The Overall Development Of Social Skills| Such As Valuing Diversity Of Ideas| Respect And Confidence Building.  Another Llp| D'Coach Programme| Is A School-Wide Values-Based Programme Based On The Core Belief That Sporting Excellence And Character Development Are Inextricably Linked. It Provides Opportunities And Platforms For All Students To Be Exposed To Team Sports. This Equips Them With Attributes| Competencies And The Confidence To Be Team Players. It Aims To Not Only Develop The Students' Talents And Potential To Excel In Team Sports But At The Same Time| Instil Valuable Character Traits And Core Values.   Pal @ Damai For Primary 1 And 2 Students Is Experiential In Nature And Incorporates Learning In A Creative| Fun| And Enjoyable Way. It Aims To Facilitate A Well-Rounded Development Of Students Through A More Balanced Curriculum. In Addition| Students Will Be Able To Develop Their Social And Emotional Learning (Sel) Competencies. Students Are Provided With Broad Exposure And Experiences Through Varied Activities So That They Can Discover Their Interest And Aptitudes. They Will Experience Learning Activities In Four Domains - Sports And Games| Outdoor Education| Performing And Visual Arts. Through These Activities| Students Will Develop Confidence| Creativity And Collaboration Skills Which They Can Apply In Their Daily Interactions.

Visionstatement_Desc: Gracious Woodlanders With The Zest To Excel
Missionstatement_Desc: To Develop In Pupils| Skills And Knowledge And A Desire For Continuous Learning In Order To Stay Relevant For The Future.
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Woodlands Primary School Has A Rich History| With Its Humble Beginnings As A Kampong School In Sugei Kadut In 1953 Before Being Officially Named As Woodlands Primary In 1976. With More Than 40 Years Of History| The School Has Nurtured Generations Of Successful Woodlanders In Their Respective Fields| Many Of Whom Have Returned Back To Serve As Teachers| Parent Support Group Members| Alumni And Members Of The School Advisory Committee.  The School Believes Strongly In Providing Pupils With A Holistic Education And Through That| Helping Them To Discover And Develop Their Individual Interests| Talents And Strengths. We Have Many Engaging Programmes In Place To Achieve This| And Our Staff Is Committed To Providing A Student-Centric| Values Driven Education For Our Pupils.  Our Very Strong Culture Of Care Have Enabled Us To Build A Closely-Knit Community With Our Stakeholders. We Believe In Building Quality Relationships So That We Can Work Together To Value Add To Our Pupils' Learning And Development. Our Key Partners And Active Parent Support Group Are Instrumental In Providing Valuable Authentic Experiences And Positive Role Modelling For Our Pupils To Learn Through Values In Action.  Our Pupils' Zest To Excel Has Helped The School To Build A Reputation Of Excellence In The Area Of Sports| Performing Arts And Visual Arts. These Are Key Avenues Through Which The School Provides A Holistic Education For Our Pupils| And The Character Traits And Attitudes Developed From These Avenues Have Served Our Pupils Well In Both Academic And Non-Academic Aspects Of Their Education Journey.  The School Vision Of Pupils Becoming "Gracious Woodlanders With The Zest To Excel" Shows Our Commitment To Nurture Pupils Who Are Ready For The Future. As We Help Pupils To Develop 21St Century Skills| We Also Continue To Stress Our Core Values - Respect| Resilience| Passion| Adaptability| Collaboration And Innovation| Which Will Guide Our Pupils As They Grow To Make A Difference In Society.
Special_Sdp_Offered: The School Believes That Academic And Character Building Are Equally Important In The Development Of The Whole Child.   The School'S Learning For Life Programme (Llp)| Sports Performance And Character Education (Space)| Is A Whole School Approach To Character Building Through Sports. The Llp Is Anchored On The Beliefs That Developing A Passion For Sports Is An Important Component In The Holistic Development Of Pupils| And That Sportsmen Need To Possess Sound Values And Character. The Llp Builds On The School'S Niche In Volleyball. The Programme Provides All Pupils The Opportunities To Hone Their Physical Skills| And Develop Values Of Respect| Resilience| Passion| Adaptability| Collaboration And Innovation (Wdp Core Values) As They Work Towards Common Goals.  Our Other Llp| Performance And Character Education Through Music (Pace@Music)| Is A Progressive 6-Year Music And Choral Programme That Complements The School'S Music Curriculum. Besides Grooming Talents To Attain Choral Excellence Through Choir Cca| All Pupils Are Exposed To Various Singing Related Modules To Enrich Their Experience Throughout Their 6 Years In School. Pupils Are Also Exposed To A Variety Of Musical Instruments| From Cajons To Ukulele| To Enrich Them With An Encompassing Musical Experience. Pupils Can Pursue Their Interests Further In The Wide Range Of Performing Arts Ccas Offered By The School.  All Pupils Also Experience Philosophy For Children (P4C@Woods)| An English-Enriched Programme Conducted By Teachers From Primary 1 To Primary 6. P4C Lessons Are Engaging| Communicative And Collaborative Lessons That Facilitate 20 Pupils To Engage In A Community Of Inquiry. Beyond P4C Lessons| There Is Extensive Use Of The P4C Thinking Tools In Different Subjects To Encourage Pupils To Be Creative| Caring And Critical In Their Thinking.

Visionstatement_Desc: Guided By Values| Every Eunosian A Happy Learner| A Confident Communicator And A Critical Thinker
Missionstatement_Desc: Nurturing Every Child In A Caring And Vibrant Environment To Achieve His/Her Personal Best And Contribute Actively To Society
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Every Staff In Eunos Primary Is Committed To The School Philosophy "Every Child Can Learn And Achieve In A Caring Environment". This Commitment Is Evident In The Tireless Efforts To Provide Every Student With Opportunities To Develop Holistically.   In The Cognitive Domain| The School Has Developed In-House Programmes To Meet The Differing Needs Of Her Students. Two Examples Are The Heals Programme (Helping And Enabling All Learners To Succeed) - A Differentiated Literacy Curriculum To Strengthen Our Students' Literacy Skills And The Ican Programme (Improve Confidence And Achievement In Numeracy) Aimed At Levelling Up Our Students' Confidence And Proficiency In Mathematics. To Help Students Develop To Be Critical Thinkers| The School'S Aesthetics Department Has Adopted The Use Of Making Thinking Visible Routines.  In The Aesthetics Domain| The School Prides Itself On Providing Opportunities For Our Students To Attend Performing Arts Events Such As Watching The Musical Les Miserables As Well As Putting Up Public Performances. In 2016| The School'S Third Public Performance Euni-Voices Received Many Accolades.   In The Physical Domain| The School Has Developed A Healthy Eating Project Aimed At Educating Our Students On How To Make Healthier Food Choices And Prepare Nutritious Meals Independently. Students Are Also Exposed To A Variety Of Sports Programmes Such As Roller-Blading And Archery. To Encourage An Active Lifestyle| The Annual Eunos Olympiad Provides The Opportunity For Staff| Students And Parents To Bond While Participating In Sports And Games.  Believing In The Importance Of A Close School-Home Partnership For The Benefit Of Our Students| Supportive Parents In Community Engagement (Spice @ Eunos) Was Set Up In 2011. Through This Strong Partnership| Our Students Are Exposed To Invaluable Learning Opportunities Including Short Attachments To Various Companies And Industries As Part Of Education Career Guidance.
Special_Sdp_Offered: Central To The Eunos Experience Is The Emphasis On Character Building And Values Inculcation.  Our Unique Character Moulding Programme(Champ) Aims To Inculcate The Six School Values(Care| Unity| Respect| Resilience| Integrity| Excellence) And Develop Social Emotional Skills As Well As 21St Century Competencies In Our Students.   Through The School'S Values-In-Action Programmes| Students And Staff Role-Model The Desired Values And Serve The Needs Of Our Community. We Participate In Various Recycling Drives And Green Effort Projects To Show Care And Concern For The Environment. Additionally| Our Signature Programme| Ethnic Home Visits Promotes The Appreciation Of Our Rich Cultural Heritage And Embraces Diversity. Staff And Parents Of Local And International Students Open Their Homes To Engage The Students In Learning Different Customs And Cultural Practices.  Our Learning For Life Programme|"Student Development In The Arts And Through The Art"| Is A Three-Tier Programme Comprising A Broad-Based Arts Appreciation Curriculum| Co-Curriculum Programmes For Targeted Groups And Focused Development Programmes For The Artistically Talented Students.  Another Highly Anticipated Signature Programme Is The Post-Examination Primary Six Enrichment (Pepse). Pepse Takes A Student-Centric Approach Aimed At Providing Enriching Programmes To Engage The P6 Students Meaningfully And Holistically. Activities Include Social Etiquette Lessons| Outings To Sentosa And Opportunities To Visit Companies As Part Of Career Guidance. In All| The Eunosian Experience Is Filled With Exciting And Purposeful Activities In Alignment With The School Vision Of Every Eunosian To Be A Happy Learner| Confident Communicator And Critical Thinker While Being Always Guided By Values.

Visionstatement_Desc: Lead With Character| Serve With Talents
Missionstatement_Desc: Nurturing Concerned Citizens With Integrity And A Spirit Of Excellence Through Holistic Education
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: We Believe That "Every Child Matters And Every Child Can Succeed". Since Its Founding In 1977| Henry Park Primary School Has Been Educating Responsible Citizens And Citizen-Leaders For Our Society. Much Emphasis Is Placed On The Two Key Pillars That Support The Development Of Total Curriculum And Character Building To Ensure The Holistic Development Of Talented All-Rounders. We Provide A Distinctively Unique Learning Experience To Meet The Varied Needs And Interests Of All Our Students. Supported By A Team Of Skilful| Caring And Dedicated Staff Who Take Pride In Their Service| The School Seeks To Identify The Strengths Of Each Individual Student And Develop His Or Her Potential To The Fullest| Be It The Cognitive| Aesthetic| Leadership Or Physical Domain. With Its Value-Added Academic Programmes| Coupled With A Strong Focus On Character Education| Students Are Equipped And Empowered To Be Future-Ready Citizens| Possessing A Strong Sense Of Identity And Resilience As They Contribute To Society. It Is The School'S Fervent Belief That Every Henry Park Student That Passes Through Its Doors Will Be A Holistic And Joyful Life-Long Learner.
Special_Sdp_Offered: 1. The "Character Education Programme" Seeks To Imbue Strong Values In Our Students And Develop In Them A Deep Sense Of Belonging And Rootedness To Singapore. Students Learn About Empathy And Care For The Environment And Fellow Citizens Through Via Projects. 2. The "Applied Learning Programme" Enables Students To Apply Scientific Skills And Concepts In Real-Life Situation Through Inquiry| While The Ivp Provides A Unique Opportunity For Them To Develop Their Problem-Solving & Inventive Skills. 3. "Sports4Life@Hpps" Aims To Build Character And Instil Values Through Sports And Outdoor Education. Another Key Feature Of The Llp Is The Sports Leaders Development Programme| Which Focuses On Developing Students In The Physical And Leadership Domains. There Is Also A Modular Gymnastics Programme For P1 And 2 Students To Develop Their Motor Skills| And Build Flexibility| Agility And Strength - Fundamental To The Development Of Advanced Motor Skills. 4. In The "Literature Programme"| Students Are Taught How To Be Sensitive And Empathetic Towards Others Alongside With The Appreciation And Analysis Of Good Language Use. 5. The "Programme For Active Learning" Exposes The Lower Primary Students To Varied & Fun Learning Experiences In Four Domains - Sports & Games| Outdoor Education| Performing And Visual Arts - To Nurture Their Socio-Emotional Competencies| Curiosity| Co-Operative Skills And Confidence. 6. To Prepare Our Students To Have A Global Outlook| The School Partners The Japanese School To Arrange Student And Teacher Exchanges As Well As Homestay Programme For P5 Students.

Visionstatement_Desc: Lifelong Learners| Rooted In Values
Missionstatement_Desc: Nurture Every Individual To Be A Self-Directed Learner With Strong Moral Values
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Our Philosophy: We Believe That All Children Can Learn And Achieve When They Are Given The Right Environment And Support  Culture: Pride P: Passion (Love For Self| Family| Nation And Learning) R: Resilience (Keep Trying And Never Give Up) I: Integrity (Think| Speak And Live Right) D: Diligence (Work Hard In All That I Do) E: Empathy (Think| Feel| Do Good For Others)  We Want To Build A Culture Of Pride Among Our Pupils In Line With The 21St Cc Skills As Well As Our Vision And Mission Statement. We Want Our Pupils To Develop Passion - A Strong Love For People Around Them And To Also Feel That Sense Of Love And Rootedness To Singapore. In Addition| That Love Should Also Be Extended To Learning. We Want Pupils To Have A Desire To Continually Seek Out Knowledge And Use That Knowledge To Benefit Others And Society. We Also Want To Develop In Our Pupils The Values Of Resilience To Face Challenges And Be Adaptable To The Changing World Around Them| Always Putting In Their Best Effort And Seeking Solutions To Various Obstacles And Problems They May Encounter. We Also Hope To Nurture Upright And Moral Citizens Of Singapore Who Will Have Integrity| Being Honest And Truthful In All Circumstances. Diligence Is Also Key In Helping Our Pupils Achieve Their Goals And In So Doing| They Would Appreciate That There Is Value In Hard Work. We Also Want To Nurture The Value Of Empathy In Our Pupils - To Help Them Consider The Needs Of The People Around Them| To Open Their Eyes To The Community In Which They Live In And To Awaken In Them A Realisation That They Can Impact And Make A Difference In The Lives Of The People Around Them.
Special_Sdp_Offered: Bendemeer Primary Believes In The Holistic Development Of Pupils And Using Bloom As Our Guiding Principle| We Aim To Provide Opportunities For All Students To Achieve And Excel. Bloom Stands For:  B: Building Up Confidence L: Learning In And Beyond The Classroom  O: Opportunities For Success O: Opportunities For All M: Meeting Pupils' Holistic Needs  Teaching And Learning Takes Place In And Beyond The Classroom| Leveraging On Ict To Enhance Mastery And Acquisition Of Skills And Knowledge. Pupils Also Learn And Deepen Their Knowledge Through Our Life Science Programme| Environment Education And The Incorporation Of Games To Excite And Sustain Interest In Learning. Support Programmes Are Also Available To Help Pupils Maximise Their Potential And Close Learning Gaps. The School Has Also Built New Learning Areas - Eco Garden| Bouldering Wall| Ne Corner To Enrich Pupils' Learning Experiences Beyond The Classroom.   We Also Believe That Every Pupil In Bendemeer Can Be A Leader And We Have A Customised Student Leadership Programme Which Spans 6 Years. Pupils Are Given Leadership Opportunities In Class| Ccas And Are Also Taught Self And Team Leadership Skills. Platforms Are Also Provided For Pupils To Work And Communicate With Their Friends To Apply The Skills Learnt. These Leadership Skills Include Goal And Target Setting| Effective Communication Skills And Critical Thinking And Problem-Solving Skills.   Our Modular Cca Programme Has Been Specially Designed To Help Pupil Acquire Essential Life Skills As Well As To Provide Broad Based Exposure In Both Sports And Aesthetics. Every Pupil Would Be Given The Opportunity To Learn In-Line Skating| Fencing As Well As Ethnic Dance Forms And Various Instruments In Their Time In Bendemeer Primary. We Believe That The Development Of These Skills Are Just As Important And Ensure That Pupils Are Healthy Physically| Mentally And Emotionally.

Visionstatement_Desc: Nurturing Pupils Who C.A.R.E To Succeed C.A.R.E Represents: C - Confident And Equipped With Creative And Inventive Thinking A -  Actively Contribute R -  Resilient E -  Enthusiastically Learn
Missionstatement_Desc: Providing Holistic Education To Build Character And Develop Talents In A Nurturing Environment.
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Corporation Primary School Was Established In 1975 And Has A History Of 41 Years. The School Aims To Provide A Holistic Education Through Learner-Centred Approaches. As Pupils Have Varied Learning Abilities And Potential| Our Teachers Are Empowered To Innovate And Adopt Creative Strategies That Best Meet Their Needs.  We Are Guided By Our Philosophy| 'Every Child Has Intrinsic Worth And He Can Learn And Wants To Learn. Every Child Has The Ability To Realise His Fullest Potential And Can Contribute To Society In His Individual Capacity'.    We Believe In Developing Talents By Helping Our Pupils Acquire New Knowledge And Skills To Meet Future Challenges. Our Pupils Are Provided With The Opportunities To Discover And Develop Their Talents Across Domains In A Nurturing Environment. This Belief Is Reflected In Our School Tagline: Creating Possibilities In Students.   In Line With Our Philosophy| Character Building Is The Core Of Our Mission And Sets The Foundation For Programme Development. The School Core Values Are Anchored On The Acronym - Richer| Which Stands For Respect| Integrity| Compassion| Humility| Endurance And Responsibility. We Are Committed To Guide Pupils Using Integrity As Our Moral Compass| Endurance As The Key To Success| Responsibility And Humility As Reflected In Our Actions And Respect And Compassion For Better Relationships.   The School Has A Strong Culture Of Care And Strives To Be 'One Cps Family'| Working Towards A Common Goal. Through The School Programmes| Our Pupils Build Authentic Experiences And Together With The Close Partnership Of Our Parents| We Aim To Achieve Our Vision Of 'Nurturing Pupils Who C.A.R.E To Succeed'.
Special_Sdp_Offered: The School Has Various Programmes To Cater To The Diverse Needs Of Our Pupils So As To Develop Them Holistically.  Talent Development Programme   In Our Aspiration To Develop Talents| The School Complements The Physical Education (Pe) And Aesthetics Curriculum With Sports And Art Enrichment Programmes. A Variety Of Sports And Aesthetic Modules Are Offered To The Pupils Through The Pe| Music And Art Curriculum As Well As The Programme For Active Learning. Learning Journeys To Art Museums Are Also Conducted For The P4 Pupils As Part Of The Museum Based Learning Programme To Enrich Their Learning Experiences In Visual Arts.  Through These Programmes| Pupils' Talents And Passion Are Discovered And They Are Offered Opportunities To Deepen Their Skills Through The Various Ccas.    Learning For Life Programme (Llp): Developing Pupils In The Niche Area Of Dance  The Llp Programme In Dance Aims To Build Confidence In Pupils By Exposing Them To Different Dance Forms And Allowing Them To Express Their Creativity Through Dance And Music. We Have A Structured And Effective Process To Deepen Their Passion In Dance And Pursue Dance As Their Life-Long Interest.  They Are Provided With Opportunities To Appreciate| Create And Express Themselves Through Dance.  Go-Green @ Cps  In Collaboration With The South West Cdc And National Environment Agency| Cps Green Programme Educates And Raises Awareness Among Pupils| Staff And Parents On Environmental Issues| Conservation And 3R Practices (Reduce| Reuse And Recycle). In Collaboration With The Art And Music Departments| The 3R Practices Are Incorporated Into Their Departmental Programmes| Using Recycled Materials To Create Artwork As Well As Design Percussion Instruments.

Visionstatement_Desc: Empowering Mind| Engaging Heart| Extending Hands
Missionstatement_Desc: To Nurture Confident And Self-Directed Learners Who Are Keen To Serve
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: In Yio Chu Kang Primary| We Believe That Every Child Has The Potential To Learn And Achieve. Guided By Our School Philosophy| We Seek To Bring Out The Best In Every Child.  We Are Committed To Ignite The Joy Of Learning In Every Child And Provide Opportunities For Discovery And Exploration. We Bring Up The Happy Child Who Is Confident| Curious And Caring. The Child Will Learn To Interact Well With His Peers| Think Critically And Take Responsibility For His Learning. Learning And Teaching In Yckps Is Guided By The School'S Curriculum Framework. Central To The Curriculum Framework Is The School'S Vision| Empowering Mind| Engaging Heart| Extending Hands. The Ultimate Goal Of Our Curriculum Is To Develop Every Yckps Student Into The Self-Directed Learner| Confident Person| Concerned Citizen| And Active Contributor. The School Harnesses Five Key Learning Approaches| Differentiation| Authenticity And Relevance| Experiential| Collaboration And Integration| To Provide Enriching And Engaging Experiences For The Holistic Development Of Our Students.   Through Our Academic Programmes| We Build In Every Child A Strong Foundation In Literacy And Numeracy. Our School-Based Curriculum Creates Experiences That Enable Our Learners To See Connections Across Disciplines And Acquire Competencies Such As Critical Thinking| Collaboration And Communication Skills That Will Enable Them To Thrive In The Fast-Changing Future Landscape.   We Imbue In Our Learners Core Values So That They Grow Up To Be Morally Upright Individuals Who Are Globally Aware While Being Rooted As Singaporeans. The School'S Values Of Caring| Upright| Progressive And Excellence Are Constantly Reinforced To Guide Both Staff And Students In Their Thoughts| Actions And Behaviour. We Provide Opportunities For Our Students To Reflect On The Needs Of The Community And How They Could Serve Others By Putting Their Values In Action. Through This| We Nurture The 'Youth Of Character| Keen To Serve'.
Special_Sdp_Offered: Learning For Life Programme - Developing Skills And Values Through T.E.A.M Sports@Yck The School Imbues Values And Develops Skills Through Collaborative Learning Involving The Dynamics Of Team Sports. A 3-Tiered Whole School Approach Is Deployed: 1.Character Through Sports: Students Participate In Team Sports Such As Basketball And Frisbee During Where School Values Are Inculcated. 2.Sports For All: This Holistic Programme| Through The Approach Of Exploration| Exposure And Development| Broadens Students' Sporting Experiences And Enhance Their Growth And Development. 3.Sports For Excellence: Students Who Demonstrate Potential And Aptitude In Niche Sports Of Football And Volleyball Are Placed In The Talent Development Programme. Platforms Like Inter-School Competitions Hone Their Skills And Equip Them With Values And Mental Strength To Be Confident| Resilient And Strong Team Players.  Interdisciplinary Project Work (Ipw) Ipw| Integrated With Values-In-Action Activities Promotes Inquiry And Enables Students To Appreciate Inter-Connectedness Across Disciplines. Students Acquire 21St Century Competencies Such As Critical Thinking| Collaboration| Communication Skills And Develop Care And Empathy For Environmental Concerns. Students Co-Construct Their Understanding Of Real World Problems And Apply New Knowledge In Creative And Meaningful Ways To Solve Problems.  School Values Education Programme Values-In-Action(Via): The 6-Year Programme Imbues In Students Civic-Mindedness And Nurtures Them Into Caring Citizens. The Via Activities| Themed "Our Environment"| Where Learning Spiraled From Keeping The Classrooms And School Clean To Student-Initiated Projects That Addresses Social Concerns.  Values Express: Using Lego Bricks| Students Construct And Articulate Their Interpretation And Understanding Of The Significance Of The School Values. Through The 4C(Connect|Construct|Contemplate|Continue) Approach| Students Take An Active Role In The Learning Process To Express Themselves.

Visionstatement_Desc: A Joyful School Of Confident Learners And Caring Leaders.
Missionstatement_Desc: Nurturing Every Child Holistically
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: The School Believes In Educating Each Child For Life. It Aspires To Develop Resilient Children With Joyful Attributes Of A Growth Mindset| A Heart Of Appreciation And A Sense Of Purpose; As Well As To Ground Them In Sound Values That Will Withstand The Test Of Time. We Hope To Develop Confident Life-Long Learners With The Love For Learning And Have Habits Of A Self-Directed Learner. We Aim To Provide Opportunities For Each Child To Become A Caring Leader| Serving Others And The Community As Well As Play Their Part For The Environment.   Towards This End| The School Believes That It Will 'Take A Village To Raise A Child'. In Partnership With Numerous Partners| The School Provides A Unique Blangah Rise Education Experience Customised To The Needs Of Each Child To Maximise His Or Her Potential. Ranging From Outdoor Experiences Through The Southern Ridges Located Conveniently Opposite The School| To Having Experiences Of Being An Entrepreneur In Sentosa'S Kidzflea| Each Child Develops Literacy| Numeracy And 21St Century Skills To Be Future-Ready.   The Quality Of The Unique Blangah Rise Experience Will Only Be As Good As The Team Of Teachers Who Plans And Delivers Them. We Believe In Continually Developing Ourselves Professionally To Be Skilful Teachers Who Are Caring And Competent In What We Do. And As A Team We Support And Help Each Other In Bringing Out The Best In Us As Well As Our Children. We Thank Our Stakeholders For Recognising Our Efforts Through The Numerous Awards For Inspiring Teaching And Innovation!
Special_Sdp_Offered: The Blangah Rise Experience  The School Offers A Unique Blangah Rise Education Experience That Is Customized To The Needs Of Each Child. Based On The Skillful Teaching Pedagogical Approach| Each Lesson Design Is Based On Principles Of Learning And Incorporates Ways Of Managing Attention| Discipline And Motivation Of The Learner.   The Lesson Design Also Considers The Learning Experiences And We Differentiate Our Instructions Based On The Individual Readiness And Interests Of Each Child. Hence A Child Who Might Require Greater Support Will Be Given More Scaffolding To Build Up His Or Her Competencies. The Learning Experience Is Also Further Enhanced Through Blended Learning Strategies With The Use Of Ict Tools| Such As Ipads| Where Students At Their Own Pace Could Acquire Or Create New Knowledge.  As Part Of Inculcating The Love And Joy For Learning| Students Have A Voice In Shaping The Way They Learn And We Give Them Space To Create And To Tinker. We Share Their Learning And Creations Proudly As We Display Their Efforts In Class And Throughout The School.   In Addition| The School Designed Numerous Experiences To Develop Each Child Holistically And Acquire Strong Fundamentals In Literacy| Numeracy| Character| Knowledge And 21St Century Competencies. Such Experiences Often Take Advantage Of Our Close Proximity To The Southern Ridges And Sentosa Where We Conduct Trails For The Public Or Provide Entrepreneur Opportunities As The Children Man Stalls In Sentosa To Raise Funds For Charity. Our Children Also Have The Opportunity To Acquire Digital Media Skills As They Will Be Provided With Digital Cameras For Photography And Videography That Will Provide Them With Another Medium Of Expression. Through Our Programme For Active Learning| Our Children Acquire Social-Emotional Competencies To Exercise Better Self-Management And Responsible Decision Making.

Visionstatement_Desc: Every Child A Leader Of Self| And For Others| With A Passion For Excellence.
Missionstatement_Desc: To Care| To Guide| To Inspire.
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: In Amkps| We Believe That The Purpose Of Education Is Not To Prepare Our Students For Life In The Future| But For Life In The Present As Well. Hence| The Sum Of Experiences Of In The Amkp Curriculum Does Not Solely Serve Academic Preparations For Progression To The Stage Of Formal Education Or For Economic Contribution| But Also Includes Teaching Our Students How To Take Care Of Their Own Personal Development And Being A Civil Member Of The Community And A Concerned Citizen For The Country.  In Amkps| We Believe That All Students Have The Potential And Desire To Learn. They Want To Learn More About Themselves| More About The World And How They Can Better Relate To The World. All Students Can Learn. Yet Every Child Is Unique In His/Her Interests| Perspective Of The World Around Them| Hopes And Aspirations. Hence| It Is Important To Hear The Child'S Voice| And When We Begin To Recognize And Appreciate It| We Can Better Engage The Child To Care For| Guide And Inspire Him/Her.  In Amkps| We Believe In The Provision Of Equitable Access To Quality Learning Experiences For All Students| Regardless Of Their Background. Based On The Different Students' Readiness Levels| We Must Provide Multiple Methods And Approaches By Which Students May Benefit From Diverse Learning Experiences| And Experience Success In Various Domains.  Based On These 3 Core Beliefs About The Purpose Of Education| Potential Of Learners| And Provision Of Equitable Access| We Have Conceptualized The Amkp Experience Wheel Which Is Driven 5 Critical Success Factors. They Are: A) Values Integration  B) Voice & Ownership C) Quality Relationship D) Opportunities For All E) Growth Mindset  These 5 Factors Interact And Influence The Design Of All Learning Programmes And Experiences In Amkps To Develop Within Our Students Important Leadership Habits Which Form The Set Of Desired Student Behavioural Outcomes To Help Them Become Young Leaders Who Are Self-Directed Learners And Morally Upright Citizens.
Special_Sdp_Offered: Amkps Offers A Learning For Life Programme (Llp) Known As Amkp Leadership Inspired Values Education (Alive) For All Students From Primary 1 To 6.  Alive Aims To Develop In Every Amkp Student A Set Of Values-Driven Leadership Habits To Be An Effective And Self-Directed Learner; And To Be Able To Make Right Decisions| As A Responsible And Concerned Citizen Of Singapore.  Students Who Display The Leadership Habits Consistently And Are Role Models Are Given Higher Leadership Appointments Such As School Prefects And Co-Curricular Activities (Cca) Leaders Are Provided With Leadership Training Opportunities To Stretch Their Leadership Potential.  More Than A Stand-Alone Programme| Alive Is Conceptualised As A Holistic Curriculum Comprising Various Learning Experiences; Some Integrated Into The School'S Total Curriculum While Some Are Key Components Of The School'S Cce Programme.  Alive'S Programme Design Is Outcome-Driven And Values-Based. Thirteen Leadership Habits Are Unpacked From The 6 Core School Values: Care| Respect| Integrity| Responsibility| Resilience And Excellence. These Habits Are Closely Aligned With The 21St Century Competencies And Moe Desired Outcomes. From The 13 Habits| Progressive Level-Based Behavioural Outcomes Are Crafted To Make Learning Of The Habits Age-Appropriate And Evidence-Based.  Character Matters For Leaders (Cml) Is The Main Instructional Programme For Alive| Delivered By Form And Co-Form Teachers For At Least 30 Minutes A Week. In These Cml Lessons| Students Are Exposed To Moral Reasoning Discussion| Active Learning Skills| And Personal Well-Being Tools. Since 2015| Values In Action (Via) Projects Has Become A Key Part Of The Cml Sessions To Provide A Platform For Students To Apply Leadership Habits In Community Service Projects.  Alive Also Includes A Set Of Assessment Platforms E.G. Caught Right In The Act (Crita)| Praise Cards| To Recognise And Monitor The Attainment Of The Desired Behavioural Outcomes Based On The Leadership Habits.

Visionstatement_Desc: Our Pupils| Exemplary Citizens Of Tomorrow. Missionstatement_Desc: Touching Hearts: We Care For My Pupils And Lead Them To Believe In Themselves. Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: At Mayflower Primary School| We Believe That The Purpose Of Education Is To Prepare Every Child For The Real World. Hence| The School Recognises The Importance Of Building A Strong| Broad-Based Education That Opens Up Students' Horizons And Exposes Them To Varied| Holistic Learning Experiences. Success Goes Beyond Academic Achievements As We Help Our Pupils Pursue Their Dreams By Capitalising On Their Strengths| Interests And Talents. We Strive To Engage Each Child To Discover What Makes School And Learning Worth Their Time| Energy And Effort| Thereby Inspiring Them To Take Greater Ownership Of Their Learning.   The School Aspires To Build A Culture Of Care| Excellence| Openness And Trust. A Learner Is Motivated To Excel When There Are Clear| High Expectations Set And High Levels Of Support Provided. Setting High Standards Serves To Keep Learners Engaged In A Challenging Task. It Also Enhances Their Confidence And Self-Esteem When The Goals Are Achieved. High Expectations Should Be Accompanied By High Levels Of Support So As To Minimise Frustration And Abortion Of Plans Due To Early Failures. Teachers Are Key To Effective Pupil Learning.  We Are Committed To Building A Team Of Caring And Excellent Educators Who Believe In Bringing Out The Best In Each Child. We Place Premium On Establishing Quality Teacher-Student Relationships| Thereby Creating A Safe| Conducive And Vibrant Environment For Learning. Our Teachers Are Role Models Of Lifelong Learning Who Continually Re-Examine Their Professional Practice And Keep Abreast Of Educational Trends And Development. Nurturing The Whole Child Is A Shared Responsibility Between The School And Family And We Seek To Build A Strong Partnership With Parents To Bring Out The Best In Each Child.
Special_Sdp_Offered: We Believe That If Pupils 'Make Thinking Visible' And 'Learn By Doing"| The Learning Process Will Be More Engaging. Hence We Adopt Innovative Teaching Pedagogies To Make Learning More Enjoyable And Effective. The List Of Enrichment/Signature Programmes Shown Below Is Just A Snapshot Of What The School Has To Offer:  Lower Primary (P1 And P2) Development Through Drama (Dtd) Conducted On A Weekly Basis By Our P1 And P2 Teachers Programme For Active Learning Conducted On A Weekly Basis By Our P1 And P2 Teachers A Range Of After School Enrichment Programmes Conducted On A Weekly Basis By External Vendors For Pupils To Discover Their Interests And Talents  Mid Primary (P3 And P4) Weekly Ccas Incorporated Into Curriculum Time To Maximise Pupil Participation Young Storyteller Programme For P3 Place-Based Learning (Pbl) At Singapore Art Museum For P4  Math Olympiad Training For P3 And P4 High Achievers In Math Hydroponics At P3 And P4 P4 Camp  Upper Primary (P5 And P6) Weekly Ccas Incorporated Into Curriculum Time To Maximise Pupil Participation Debating Programme For P5 Little Red Dot Reading Programme For P5 And P6 Math Olympiad Training For P5 And P6 High Achievers In Math P6 Cultural Trip To Malacca  Signature Programmes For All Levels Learning For Life Programme (Llp) - Development Of Character| Citizenship And 21St Century Competencies In And Through The Arts Teaching In And Through The Arts (Ttap) - Aesthetics Integration In Academic Subjects School-Based Excite! Character And Citizenship Education Programme Integration Of Ict Tools For Mobile| Collaborative And Self-Directed Learning

Authentic Learning Experiences To Support Cognitive Development| Pupils Are Engaged In Learning Activities Customized To Their Developmental Needs. Principal_Name: Mdm Ang Gek Leng Alison Amanda
First_Vp_Name: Mdm Ranjit Kaur D/O Mukhtar Singh
Visionstatement_Desc: We Aspire To Be The Vibrant Learning Campus Where Pupils Learn| Lead| Serve And Grow To Become Future-Ready Citizens Rooted In Values.
Missionstatement_Desc: Developing Our Pupils Into Responsible And Versatile Individuals  Who Will Be Fired With A Passion For Life Long Learning And Able To Contribute Effectively To Society.
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Guided By Our Philosophy That Every Child Can Learn| Act Responsibly And Care For Others| We Believe That There Is A Leader In Every Child Whom We Can Nurture. We Do This By Giving Varied Opportunities For Pupils To Learn Effectively| Lead Responsibly| Serve Purposefully And Grow Holistically. Special_Sdp_Offered: Our Learning Tapestry Is A Key Programme In Our Curriculum Where A Problem-Based Learning Approach Is Taken To Foster Pupils' Critical And Creative Thinking As They Learn Various Subjects Together In Current And Authentic Settings. Robotics Is The School'S Applied Learning Programme And Opportunities Are Provided For Pupils Across All Levels To Use Robotics As A Fun And Engaging Way To Solve Problems| Think Creatively And Work Together In Teams To Overcome Challenges. All Pupils| Regardless Of Their Abilities| Are Encouraged To Enjoy And Experience Success In Sports.  The School Has A Vibrant Life Science Programme That Includes Orchid Hybridization| Aeroponics And Gardens That Invite Pupils To Discover And Learn Science In Authentic Contexts| Such As A Butterfly Enclosure| Edibles Garden| Garden Of Character| Eco-Garden And Corridor Gardens. Visionstatement_Desc: Every Si Ling Pupil A Scholar Who Leads And Serves

The Esp Adopts The 3H Approach Which Covers 3 Key Developmental Domains # Head (Knowledge & Skills Acquisition)| Heart (Values Acquisition) And Hands (Participation & Contribution). Pupils With Greater Aptitude And Interest Are Given Opportunities To Lead Their Peers In Community Involvement Activities| As Well As Conduct Sharing To Create Awareness On Environment Conservation. Visionstatement_Desc: Thinkers. Learners. Leaders.

Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Jing Shan Primary School Has A Long Established History Of More Than 70 Years And Provides A Quality Holistic Education With Strong Emphasis The Five School Values Of Loyalty| Integrity| Generosity| Enthusiasm| Respect And Responsibility (Liger) To Prepare Our Pupils For The Future. Learners. Leaders."

Visionstatement_Desc: A Learning Organisation| Nurturing Global Citizens

Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: The School Believes In Student-Centric| Values-Driven Education (Sve) And Adopted Sve In The Design Of The School'S Programmes And Articulation Of The School'S Vision| Mission And Values (Inspire - Integrity| Nation-Loving| Sincerity| Perseverance| Independence| Respect And Excellence).  School Culture The School'S Culture Of Care And Learning Is Anchored On The Core Theory Of Success. It Is Actively Promoted Through Building Quality Relationships| Learning And Development Of Staff| And Development Of Pupils In The Campsl (Cognitive| Aesthetics| Moral| Physical| Social And Student Leadership) Domains. Striving For Excellence Over The Years| Yps Has Been Recognised For Excelling In Both The Curricular And Co-Curricular Areas. Special_Sdp_Offered: Learning For Life Programme (Llp): Viva De Symphonie - Championing Values: Living| Learning & Growing Through Music Anchoring On The Approaches Of Music For All And Music For Excellence| The School'S Llp Aims To Develop Pupil Character Through Its 6-Year Progressive Music Programme. Through The Alp| Pupils Develop Entrepreneurial Dare As They Are Engaged In The Hands-On Activities Of Creating New Plant Species Through Orchid Hybridisation And Nepenthes Cultivation. Cultivating The Spirit Of Learning Through Design Thinking In Project Work Project Work In The School Is Exciting And Engaging As Pupils Immerse Themselves In The Design Thinking Process In Solving Real World Issues. Praise (Pre-Assembly Instruction For Student Engagement) And Ar2Ise (All-Round Recess Instruction For Student Engagement) To Develop All Pupils Holistically| They Are Involved In The School'S Praise And Ar2Ise Programmes. The Use Of Ict In Project Work| Classroom Activities And Learning Journeys To Develop Skills In Self-Directed And Collaborative Learning In All Students. Visionstatement_Desc: Leaders Of Character| Learners For Life

Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: The School Believes In The Holistic Development Of The Child. Guided By Our School Vision "Leaders Of Character| Learners For Life"| The School Has Five Desired Student Outcomes For Every Townsvillite Growing Students To Be: A Gracious Pupil; A Self-Directed Learner; A Creative Thinker; A Responsible Citizen; And A Resilient Leader.    Our School Values| The Icare3 (Integrity Our Foundation; Compassion Our Key; Ardent For Singapore| Our Home; Respect| Responsibility & Resilience| Our Strengths) Are Not Only Taught Explicitly By Teachers And Incorporated In To Our School Programmes. In Imbuing Identified Values And Outcomes| The Framework Has Been Integrated Into Instructional And Non-Instructional Programmes While Being Explicitly Taught In Our Customised School Wide Programmes Namely Co-Curricular & Special Programmes (Ccsp)| Gifts (Generating Interactions For Total Socialisation)   And Values-In-Practice Programme (Vip).

Visionstatement_Desc: An Achieving School With A Caring Environment
Missionstatement_Desc: Developing A Community Of Life-Long Learners| Leaders Of Character And Socially Responsible Global Citizens
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Qifa Primary School| Previously Known As Khee Fatt Study Institution  Was Set Up In 1906 By The Char Yong (Dabu) Association.  The School Commemorated Its 30Th Anniversary As A Government School In 2015| And 110 Years As A Hakka School Started By The Char Yong (Dabu) Association In 2016. As A Government School| Qifa Continues To Enjoy A Good And Unique Relationship With Its Founding Organisation.   Qifa Is A Choice School In The Clementi/West Coast Neighbourhood| With The School Conducting Balloting In The P1 Registration Exercise Since 2010.  Over The Years| The School Has Garnered Many Accolades| And It Is Recognised By Its Stakeholders For Its Rigorous Academic Programmes| Stellar Aesthetics And Co-Curricular Outcomes As Well As A Range Of Non-Academic Programmes That Cater To The All-Round Development Of Its Pupils.  These Achievements Are Made Possible By A Team Of Dedicated And Forward-Looking Staff Together With The Support Of Parents| Ex-Students And The School Advisory Committee.  Through Delivering A Quality| Holistic And Value-Added Education That Recognises And Develops Pupils Of Diverse Abilities And Talents| The School Seeks To Realise Its Vision To Be "An Achieving School With A Caring Environment".
Special_Sdp_Offered: Applied Learning Programme - Effective Communication  The School Aims To Develop Every Qifa Pupil Into A Confident Person Who Communicates Effectively| In Line With Moe'S 21St Century Skills And Student Outcomes. The Effective Communication Curriculum Includes Modules In Speech| Drama And Theatre| Master Persuasive And Argumentative Techniques| And Leverages Ict Tools And Its Communication Arts Studio.  Platforms And Opportunities Are Provided To A Select Group Of Talents To Demonstrate And Hone Their Skills Through Drama| Debates And Public Speaking Competitions.   Learning For Life (Llp) Programme - Character Moulding Programme Through Sports (Champs@Qifa)  Volleyball Has Always Been A Prominent Sport With A Strong Tradition In Qifa. The School Rides On Its Niche In Volleyball To Broaden Its Impact Through Champs @Qifa. It Seeks To Equip All Qifa Pupils With Important Life-Skills And Values Such As Teamwork| Perseverance| Sportsmanship| And Care For One Another. It Provides First-Hand Opportunity For Pupils To Exemplify The School Values Represented In 'Aspire': A Caring Heart| Self-Discipline & Integrity| Pride In Work| Inquiring Mind And Healthy Body| Resilience And Enterprising Spirit.  Talent Development Programme The School Nurtures Its High Progress Pupils Through The Talent Development Programme (Tdp).  Tdp Is A Customised Curriculum With Stimulating Pedagogical Approaches And Authentic Learning Experiences.  The Active Thinking @Qifa Programme Seeks To Equip The Pupils With Moe'S 21St Century Competencies And Skills And Desired Student Outcomes As Well As Elements Of Design Thinking With A Focus On Developing Empathy.  The 'Values Education Through Philosophy For Children (P4C) @Qifa' Curriculum Provides Opportunities For The Pupils To Question Values Often Established As Norms| And Internalise Ideas And Values In A Community Of Learners.

Visionstatement_Desc: Learning School Giver3S Heart
Missionstatement_Desc: To Nurture Thinking Individuals And Gracious Citizens
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: The School'S Vision Of 'A Learning School With A Giver3S Heart' Is Progressively Realized Through The Strategic Thrusts Of Nurturing Self-Directed And Confident Learners| Developing Exemplary Character & Active Citizenry| Building Quality Staff And Forging Partnerships. They Guide The School In Its Commitment Towards The Creation Of School Experiences That Are Memorable| Enriching And Inspiring.   This Is In Line With The School'S Mission 'To Nurture Thinking Individuals And Gracious Citizens' And We Are Anchored And Guided By The School Giver3S Values Of: Graciousness| Integrity| Versatility| Empathy| Responsibility| Respect| Resilience And Sincerity.   The School Also Builds On A Culture Of Care And Collaboration For Staff.
Special_Sdp_Offered: The School Believes In The Holistic Development Of The Whole Child.  Our School'S Applied Learning Programme (Alp) - Developing Zhangde Giver3S Values Through Environment Education Aims To Instil In Our Students A Love And Concern For The Environment Through The Inculcation Of Our Giver3S Values. The School Has Developed Its Own Distinctive Environment Education Curriculum That Provides Students With Platforms To Learn And Explore The Importance Of Conserving Natural Resources. Through These Platforms| Our School Aims To Develop Future Generations Of Thinking Individuals And Gracious Citizens Who Take Accountability For Their Own Actions And Be Responsible Towards The Environment| A Key 21St Cc Competency.   Our P3 - P5 Level Camps Are Part Of The School'S Structured Camp| Leadership Training And Cce Programme. It Is Aligned With The School'S Pe & Sports And Outdoor Education Framework And Aim To Provide Our Students A Holistic Education.   The Learning Experiences For The Camps Are Aligned With Our School'S Applied Learning Programme (Alp) On 'Developing Zhangde Giver3S Values Through Environment Education. The Learning Experiences At The Camps Aim To Educate Our Students To Care For Their Environment And The World We Live In. The Camp Objectives Also Ties In With The Cce Learning Outcomes| Where Students Develop Self-Awareness And Self-Management Skills To Achieve Personal Well-Being And Effectiveness. Students Also Develop Social-Awareness And Interpersonal Skills To Build And Maintain Positive Relationships.   Values-In-Action (Via) Are Learning Experiences That Support Students' Development As Socially Responsible Citizens Who Contribute Meaningfully To The Community| Through The Learning And Application Of Values| Knowledge And Skills. Via Fosters Student Ownership Over How They Contribute To The Community. As Part Of Via| Students Reflect On Their Experiences| The Values They Have Put Into Practice| And How They Can Continue To Contribute Meaningfully.

First_Vp_Name: Mdm Lee Lay See/ Mrs Lay See Neufeld
Visionstatement_Desc: An Icon Of Excellence: To Value And Be Valued
Missionstatement_Desc: To Nurture Life Long Learners Of Good Character
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: The School Philosophy Is Every Pupil Can Learn And Excel. We Believe That Each Pupil Through His Effort With The Strong Collaboration Of Home And School Will Be Able To Learn And In Time To Come Have Personal Mastery.    The School Culture Is One Of Innovation| Care And Excellence. (Ice)  The School Subscribes To The Core Theory Of Success That Quality Relationships Lead To Quality Action And Quality Results.The School Values Learning| Relationship And The Individual.  As A Community School It Aspires To Be A Blessing And A Contribution To The Community.
Special_Sdp_Offered: *Bi-Cultural Programme Aims To Deepen Pupils' Proficiency In The Language Through Exposure To Chinese Literature.  *Play@Work Is The Integration Of Science In Lower Primary English Lessons Aims To Spark Interest And Curiosity Of Science Phenomenon In The Pupils.  *Scientist@Work - With Scientific Inquiry As Our Main Pedagogy| Science Is Taught Using The 5E Instructional Model.Strategies Like Role-Playing| Problem Solving| Investigating And Cooperative Learning Are Employed.The Importance Of Ethics Of A Young Scientist Are Impressed On The Pupils. *Senior & Junior Olympics Provides Pupils Authentic Opportunities To Demonstrate And Develop Character Aligned With The Spirit Of Olympism. Pupils Apply Skills And Attitudes Learnt Through The Year As They Participate In Inter Class Competitions.  *Star Acttitude ( Strengths| Talents| Aspiration And Resilience To Achieve A Character Turnaround And Transformation Inspired Through Drama In Education) Is The School'S  Learning For Life Programme. Through Creative Play And Stimulation Of The Imagination|Pupils Will Graduate With Confidence In Creating| Performing And Responding. *Tps Spring Seeks To Inculcate Life Skills In Pupils Through An Awareness Of The Environment And The Community That We Live In. The Activities Are Customised For The Different Levels. *A Set Of Rubrics With Clear Expectations| In Alignment With School Values And The Hallmark Of A Tampinesian Is Provided For Pupils Self- Assessment And To Support Parents' Endorsement In Recognising The Child'S Progress In Character Development. *Laser Is A Specialised| Customised Primary 1 Literacy Intervention Programme Initiated By The School To Address Literacy Skills Of P1 Pupils Who Scored Poorly In The National School Readiness Test| But Are Not Identified For The Learning Support Programme (Lsp). *School-Based Dyslexia Remediation (Sdr) Programme Is A Structured| Multi-Sensory And Explicit Teaching Evidence-Based Strategy To Equip Pupils With Dyslexia.

First_Vp_Name: Mr Mohamad Noor Bin Abdul Manaf @
Visionstatement_Desc: An Innovative Thinker  A Gracious Leader  An Engaged Citizen
Missionstatement_Desc: To Nurture The Leader In Everyone With A Heart To Give And A Mind To Grow.
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Inspired By The Starfish Story| The School Has Chosen Starfish To Be Its School Mascot. Underpinning This Is The School'S Guiding Pinciple Of Every Child Matters| Every Staff Matters. The Chongzheng Family Is Committed To Making A Positive Difference In The Lives Of Our Students| While Ensuring The Professional Development And Well-Being Of Our Staff| So As To Develop The Cz Star In Every Child.
Special_Sdp_Offered: The School'S Applied Learning Programme Is Innovation And Enterprise Which Is Called Epic - Empowering Pupils To Innovate For Community.  The Tagline For This Programme Is Fun Ideas Serious Solutions. Through The School-Based Innovation Curriculum| All P1-P6 Students Are Progressively Taught Critical Thinking| Creative Thinking| Problem-Solving And Decision-Making Skills Through Project Work. To Enable The Students To Authentically Apply Their Learning| The School Integrates Project Work With Values-In-Action (Via) Programme. For Our Students Who Are Inclined Towards Innovation| The School Has Established An Innovation Club To Provide Intensive Training And Exposure To Competitions To Hone Their Innovation Skills. Students Create Products And Embark On Projects That Help Solve Community Issues.  In Providing Holistic Education| The School Conducts Modular Programmes For Music And Art. The Students Are Also Exposed To Environment Education Through Structured Programmes That Are Organised Throughout The Year. With The Setting Up Of Solar Ehaven| An Open Garden-Like Learning Deck On Sustainable Energy| Environment Education Is Integrated Into The Science Curriculum. There Are Various Stations Where Pupils Have Hands-On Activities To Learn About Energy Conversion.

Visionstatement_Desc: An Innovative School Of Discerning Learners And Caring Leaders
