Missionstatement_Desc: We Will Provide Quality Teaching And Learning So That Our Pupils Are Rooted In Values And Stretched In Their Potential.
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Xinghua Primary School Is Committed To Growing Pupils To Be Caring And Also Passionate About Learning. We Are Committed To Providing Diverse Learning Opportunities Which Challenge Students And Yet Offer Happy Learning Moments. Our Programmes| Guided By Sound Processes| Allow Pupils Opportunities To Learn Through New Experiences.  Through A Culture Of Care And Innovation| Our Pupils Are Immersed In An Environment That Equips Them With The 21St Century Competencies.
Special_Sdp_Offered: The Learning For Life Programme (Llp) In Xinghua Primary School Centres On "Confidence Building And Critical Thinking Through The Visual Arts". The School Believes That This Focus Is One Of The Key Strategies To Enhance The Actualization Of The School Vision. Through Participation In Visual Arts| Pupils' Creativity And Curiosity To Learn Can Be Unlocked| Helping Them To Grow A Passion For Learning.  Increased Pupil Participation In Visual Arts Programmes Will Lead To More Visible And Tangible Vibrancy As The Physical Presence Of Artworks And Pupil Activities Throughout The School Create The Atmosphere. As The Pupils Discover More About The Cultures Of Other Races Through The Respective Art Forms And The Artworks Of Local Artists| They Develop A Deeper Understanding Of Singapore'S Ethnic Diversity And A Sense Of National Identity. This Nurtures The Pupils Into Sensitive And Caring Citizens. Not Only Does Active Participation In Visual Art Cultivate The School Values| The Programme Is Able To Promote Critical Thinking And Communication Skills Among The Pupils To Become Confident Learners Of The 21St Century.

First_Vp_Name: Mr Andy Mickey Choong Tek Choy
Visionstatement_Desc: Global Learners| Discerning Citizens
Missionstatement_Desc: Nurturing Hearts And Minds
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: At Jiemin Primary School We Aim To Equip Our Students With The 21St Century Competencies And To Build A Strong Foundation In The Languages| Mathematics And Science.  We Are Committed To Create A Supportive| Engaging| Safe And Inclusive Environment With The Support Of Parents And The Community.
Special_Sdp_Offered: Our Journalists In Making| An Applied Learning Programme| Aims To Develop Our Students In Critical Thinking| Oral And Written Communication Skills And Build Their Confidence To Speak And Write On Any Chosen Topic At The Class| School Or Community Level. Presentations During Recess And At School Events Are Platforms To Build Students' Confidence. Students Who Would Like To Learn More About Journalism Can Participate In The Journalists' Club Where They Learn More About Being A Journalist Through Workshops And Platforms Like Reporting Real-Time News During School Events.  Through Our Learning For Life Programme| Aesthetics Alive| Students Learn To Draw| Play Instruments| Compose Songs And Appreciate Music And Art Through Our Structured Art And Music Curricula. Students Are Also Provided The Opportunities To Experiment With Different Musical Instruments And Dances During Recesses. Students Who Have A Flair For Dancing And Music Can Also Participate In Our Performing Arts Ccas Such As  Modern Jazz Dance And Angklung Ensemble Where More Specific Skills Are Taught And Students Also Develop Team Spirit And Leadership Qualities.   To Help Students Make Informed Choices| P4 To P6 Students Make Use Of The Ecg Portal To Find Out More About Themselves And The Type Of Secondary Schools That Would Be Suitable For Them. P6 Students Attend A One-Day Immersion Programme At Selected Secondary Schools To Provide Students With The Opportunity To Experience Secondary School Life And Better Understand About The Secondary School Curriculum. Career Talks And Talks By Former Students Are Some Platforms Where Our Students Could Find Out More About Secondary School Life And The Careers That They Are Interested In.

Visionstatement_Desc: A Concerned Leader| A Lifelong Learner
Missionstatement_Desc: To Nurture A Community Of Passionate Learners Who Are Leaders With Sound Character| In Partnership With Stakeholders
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: With A History Of Over 30 Years| Fuchun Primary School Is Located In The Heart Of Woodlands. As Encapsulated In Its Vision And Mission| The School Believes That Every Pupil Is A Confident Leader Who Positively Influences Others Through The Demonstration Of The School Values - Respect| Care| Perseverance| Responsibility And Integrity And Embraces Social And Cultural Diversities. The School Also Believes That Each Pupil Is A Learner Who Is Constantly Reflective| Actively Sharing| Continuously Learning And Possesses The Ability To Aesthetically Respond.   The School Believes In The Inculcation Of Values And Life Skills Mastery As These Skills Are Essential For The Pupils To Face Future Challenges In The Globalised World. As Such| The Teaching Of Values Is Integral To The School'S Curriculum And Co-Curriculum Programmes. Pupils Who Have Displayed The School Values Consistently Will Be Affirmed Through The Presentation Of The Fuchun Values Award In Each Term. Bi-Monthly Assembly Talks Are Carried Out To Reiterate The Importance Of Values In Building Character.    The School Believes That The Quality Of Teaching And Learning Depends On Its Teachers. Hence| As Part Of Professional Development| Teachers Are Actively Engaged In Discussion To Question Their Assumptions| Share Subject Expertise And Teaching Strategies To Better Engage The Learners. The School Is Also Proud Of Its Strong Culture Of Care Among The Staff.  Through The Empowerment By The School Leaders And The Inclusive Environment Provided In The School| This Culture Of Care Is Further Strengthened And Passed On To The Pupils. Under The Positive Influence Of Their Teachers Who Show Concern| Pupils Demonstrate The Value Of Care Through Their Thoughts| Words And Deeds.
Special_Sdp_Offered: In Alignment To Its School'S Vision| 'A Concerned Leader| A Lifelong Learner'| The School Seeks To Create A Learning Community To Help Our Pupils Excel Holistically With A Key Focus To Develop Its Pupils Aesthetically. A Comprehensive School-Wide Programme And Achievements In The Performing Arts Led The School To Be Recognised As A Moe Learning For Life Programme (Llp) School In Music Education And Performing Arts| And The N7 Cluster Centre Of Learning In Music. Pupils Are Given Many Opportunities To Perform In Front Of An Audience Through The Termly Music Competitions Or Exhibit Their Artworks Publicly. They Are Groomed To Become Confident Performers To Showcase Their Talents At Various Platforms Such As Class Competitions And Art Jam Sessions During Recess.  The Fuchun Home Skills Programme Is A Signature Programme In The Cce Curriculum. This Programme Comprises Lessons On Basic Cooking And Sewing Skills Which Are Pitched According To The Pupils' Readiness| Motor Skills And Interests. Through This Programme| Pupils Learn To Be Independent And Self-Reliant. The Seamless Integration Of English| Math And Science In The Home Skills Programme Provides Pupils With Opportunities To Experience Authentic Learning Beyond The Classroom. Pupils Are Able To Revisit Or Learn Concepts Through Hands-On Activities.  The School Believes That Every Pupil Has The Capability To Lead By Positively Influencing Oneself And Others Through His Or Her Thoughts| Words And Actions. Every Pupil Is Given The Chance To Take Up A Leadership Role In The School'S Bid To Develop Concerned Leaders. The School Developed A Two-Tiered Leadership Development Framework Which Consists Of Cohort And Locus Leadership Development. The Former Focuses On The Development Of Personal Leadership Skills In Every Pupil While The Latter Develops Specific Leadership Skills For Student Leaders To Hone.  With These Programmes| The School Strives To Nurture Concerned Leaders| And Lifelong Learners In Every Of Its Pupils.

Visionstatement_Desc: Self-Directed Learners . Confident Leaders . Caring Citizens
Missionstatement_Desc: We Are Committed To Providing A Learner-Centric And Values-Driven Education.
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Guided By Our Philosophy That 'Every Child Can Learn And Achieve'| The School Strives To Provide Every Child With A Broad-Based Education With Opportunities For The Development Of Talents. The Student-Centred Philosophy Rests On The Premise That Every Child Has The Innate Ability To Acquire Knowledge And Skills And Is Thereby Able To Grow And Develop When Supported By A Safe And Nurturing Environment Conducive For Learning.   The School Believes In Providing A Caring And Positive School Culture For All| Whereby Every Individual Enjoys Learning And Embracing The School Motto| Striving 'Towards Excellence'. Anchored On Values With A Focus On Student-Centricity| Our Staff Are Committed To Nurturing Our Students To Help Them Embody The Desired Outcomes Of Education (Does) In Being A Confident Person| A Self-Directed Learner| An Active Contributor And A Concerned Citizen.     The School Believes The Importance Of Partnership With Key Stakeholders For The Holistic Development Of Our Students. We Seek To Build Quality Relationships With Our Key Stakeholders Based On Trust And Mutual Benefits To Benefit Our Students.
Special_Sdp_Offered: In Alignment To The Aspiration For Our Students| Our Programmes Will Focus On The Holistic Education Of Bukit Viewians. In Particular| Our Niche Programmes - (1) 'Nurturing Values And Character Through Aesthetics' Programme Which Serves To Nurture Confidence And Resilience In Our Students Through The Arts| And To Develop Their Social Awareness And Management; And (2) 'Developing Thinkers| Collaborators & Communicators' Programme' Which Aims To Equip Students With Critical And Inventive Thinking Skills And Dispositions.

Visionstatement_Desc: Every Cedarian A Lifelong Learner| A Person Of Character
Missionstatement_Desc: Nurturing Enthusiastic Learners And Responsible Citizens
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: The School Aspires To Groom Every Cedarian Into Individuals With Robust Character| Rooted In Values. Every Cedarian Also Understands That Learning Never Stops. Each Of Them Loves Learning And Will Pursue Continuous Learning Throughout His/Her Life. We Are Committed To Developing Cedarians Into Individuals Who Take Ownership Of Their Learning And Participate Actively In Lessons.   Our Cedar Values: - Courtesy   - Care  - Enthusiasm                                               - Determination   - Adaptability   - Responsibility
Special_Sdp_Offered: Talent Management Our Talent Management Model Aims To Identify| Develop And Hone The Academic And Non-Academic Talents Of Our Students. In So Doing| The School Strives To Help Them Build Confidence And Cultivate A Drive To Succeed.  Effective Communicators We Aim To Develop Cedarians Who Are Able To Think Independently And Critically| And Communicate Effectively. Our In-House Effective Communication Curriculum Aims To Develop Students' Ability To Communicate Effectively Both In Writing And Speaking| And To Exercise Sound Reasoning| Decision-Making And Metacognition.  Creative Thinkers Our Applied Learning Programme| Creative And Inventive Thinking| Is A 6-Year Programme Where We Aim To Develop Our Students' Learning Attitude And Thinking Skills While Honing Their Capacity For Higher-Order Thinking And Equipping Them With A Problem-Solving Mind-Set. Students Who Demonstrated Interest And Aptitude Are Invited To Join Our Future Innovators' Programme Where They Are Given Opportunities To Further Enhance Their Thinking Skills At Platforms Beyond The School.  Upstanding Leaders Our Student Leaders Are Called "Upstanding Leaders"- "Upstanding" Because They Metaphorically And Literally Stand Up For And Advocate What Is Right; "Leaders" Because We Believe That With Training| All Our Students Are Able To Awaken And Realise Their Leadership Potential. We Aim To Strengthen The Moral Fibre In Our Students By Teaching Them Not Only To Be Model Students But Also To Be Role Models For Others In Both Word And Action.  Active Contributors The Various Platforms In Cce And Students' Programmes Aim To Equip Students With The Abilities And Skills To Contribute Positively To School Initiatives Such As Via| Environmental Education And Student Suggestion Scheme. Through These Initiatives| We Hope To Strengthen The Students' Social Awareness By Increasing Their Knowledge Of Community Issues| Strengths And Resources Which Will Help Them To Develop Understanding Of The Wider Community.

Visionstatement_Desc: We Learn| We Grow| We Achieve
Missionstatement_Desc: Grow Leaders Empower Learners Mould Character
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Through The School'S Vision| Oeps Aims To Create A Positive Learning Environment And To Provide Meaningful Learning Experiences That Nurture The Child To Be A Caring And Confident Lifelong Learner Who Strives For His/Her Best. The School Believes That Every Child Deserves The Opportunity To Learn And To Grow As Good Role Models| And To Serve And To Contribute Back To The School And The Society.  Building On The Strong Culture Of Care And Focus On Character Development| The School Strives To Strengthen Its Total Curriculum Through Multiple Structured Learning Platforms That Allow Students To Practise 21St Century Competencies So That They Can Be Self-Directed And Stay Resilient In Their Pursuit For Both Academic And Non-Academic Excellence. For Example| The Strengthening Of The School'S Student Leadership Programme Is Intended To Provide Leadership Experience For All Students In Via Service-Learning Projects So That They Can Internalize The Importance Of Serving And Contributing To The Society.   The School Strongly Believes That Nurturing The Staff Competencies And Building Effective Partnerships With Stakeholders Are Key Drivers Behind The Delivery Of Total Curriculum.   The School Believes That A Good Oeps Teacher Exhibits Competencies In Three Key Areas Namely| As Collaborative Learners| Designers Of Lessons And Reflective Practitioners. These Are Essential Qualities To Build Positive Teacher-Student Relationship And Meeting The Present And Future Needs Of The Students. The School Also Acknowledges That The Opera Parents Club (Opc) Is A Vital Link To Promote Home-School Partnerships. By Leveraging On Opc'S Support And Expertise| The School Is Able To Offer Students Richer Learning Experiences Such As International Friendship Day And Career Day.
Special_Sdp_Offered: The School Has Structured Key Programmes To Strengthen Its Delivery Of Holistic Education And Building 21St Century Competencies: A) The 'Ignite De Arts' Programme Aims To Promote A Deeper Appreciation Of The Arts In All Students. The Comprehensive 6-Year Programme Infuses Values Education In Four Key Domains: Learn Arts| Explore Arts| Collaborative Arts And Fun Arts. Through These Meaningfully Planned Experiences| The Students Are Able To See| Think| Hear And Wonder| And In Turn Self-Discover Their Potential And Talents In Arts. B) Student Leadership (Learn To Lead| Lead To Serve): The School Has Set Up A School-Wide Multi-Tier Structure To Provide Leadership Development Opportunities For All Students. Leadership Trainings Are Customized At Class Level And For Upper Primary Students. They Apply The Leadership Skills In Their Role As P5 Buddy To New P1 Students. Students Who Show Greater Aptitude Are Identified And Further Developed Via Additional Leadership Training And Workshops To Sharpen Their Leadership Competencies.  With Such Skills Set| They Will Be Able To Initiate Action Amongst Peers To Make A Difference And Improve The Lives Of Others. With A Greater Ownership Of The Learning Experiences| They Will Find The Learning Even More Meaningful And Likely Be Motivated To Want To Make A Difference To The Community. C) Character Education: The School Sustains Its Positive School Culture By Adopting Two School-Wide Approaches: Firstly| 'Learn Through Play' Is A School-Based Programme Anchored On The School'S Belief That Students Learn Best During Play And Students Are Guided By Trained Staff To Manage Their Emotions And Actions When Interacting With Others. Secondly| The School Adopts Restorative Practices To Guide Students To Reflect On Their Actions And Consequences So That They Take Responsibility For Their Actions And Learn To Care For Others. Through These Key Approaches| The School Has Enhanced The Social Well-Being Of The Students.

Visionstatement_Desc: Inspiring Learners| Edifying Leaders
Missionstatement_Desc: To Nurture Our Pupils To Be Future-Ready By Providing A Total Education In Rvps
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Our Vision "Inspiring Learners| Edifying Leaders" Commits Every Rvian To Work Towards Striving For The Best Outcomes For Themselves And People Around Them. As Inspiring Learners| Rvians Have The Passion For Continuous Learning| Seek Better Ways Of Doing Things And Become Committed Members Of The School As A Learning Organization. As Edifying Leaders| Rvians Have The Confidence And Leadership Qualities To Inspire| Enrich And Nurture The Lives Of Others. We Are Committed To Imbue Our Staff And Pupils With This Spirit Of Inspiring And Edifying For Us To Contribute To The Progress Of Our School And Nation.  Our Philosophy 1.We Believe That Every Child Wants To And Can Learn| Develop And Lead. 2.We Believe That Education Is Never Just About Knowledge And Skills. Importantly| It Should Also Be About Character And Values. 3.We Believe Education Must Nurture Creativity And Curiosity In All Children. 4.We Believe Education Must Empower All Children To Be Critical In Their Thinking. 5.We Believe That Learning Takes Place In Safe And Caring Environment| & When Children Construct Knowledge Actively And Collaboratively.  Our Core Values 1.Serve With Respect -We Value People| Reaching Out To Build Strong & Trusting Relationships. 2.Lead With Integrity -We Demonstrate Honesty & Moral Courage| Being Upright & Trustworthy. 3.Live With Compassion -We Seek To Understand & Care| Extending Our Hands To Others In Need. 4.Learn With Excellence -We Inspire Learning| Seek Continuous Improvement & Bring Out The Best In Everyone.  Our Motto Strive For The Best  Our Culture Rvps Is Committed To Building A School Culture Of Excellence Through Joy In Our Work & Synergy Amongst Our Staff. 1. Excellence -We Pursue Excellence In Empowering Staff Capacity & Enhancing Student Learning & Achievements. 2. Joy -We Experience Joy As We Inspire Learning In Our Students & Edify School Colleagues. 3. Synergy -We Enhance Staff Synergy With Respect| Integrity & Compassion So As To Contribute To Excellence.
Special_Sdp_Offered: 1. Learning For Life Programme (Llp) - 'Rvps Leadership Development For A Vuca World'   We Believe That What Students Can Do With What They Know Is More Important Than What They Know. Our School Mission "To Nurture Our Pupils To Be Future-Ready By Providing A Total Education In Rvps" Gives A Strong Indication Of Our Endeavour. Our School Has Put In Place A Holistic Education Experience Strategic Plan Which Encompasses Core Academic Programme And Programmes Which Are Geared Towards Character| Citizenship| Life Skills And Leadership Development. We Believe That Our Total Education Will Nurture Our Students To Become "Inspiring Learners| Edifying Leaders"| And Realise The Desired Outcomes Of Education.   A Key Underpin Of Our Llp Is The School'S Philosophy "Every Child Can Learn And Lead". Aligned To This Belief| We Have Ensured That A Student-Centric| Values Driven Education With Varied And Holistic Learning Opportunities Is Provided For All Our Pupils. Strategic Plans And Programmes To Develop And Nurture Students In Their Leadership As Well As Their Active Participation In Community Involvement Projects Have Been Created And Enhanced Over The Years.  All These Endeavours Are Undertaken To Ensure That All Rvians Will Grow Up To Be Confident Individuals| Who Take Initiatives For Their Learning| And Contribute Actively As Citizens Of Our Country With Compassion And Integrity. Our Llp'S Key Areas Of Focus Are: A) Values Education Through Character Citizen Education (Cce) B) Values In Action (Via) Through Community Involvement C) Leadership Development Through Experiential Learning In Camps D) Edifying Leaders Through Leadership Development Programmes  2. Other Student Development Programmes - P5 China Immersion Programmes - P3-P5 Camps - Learning Support Programmes (Including Sdr & Rrp) - P3 Swimsafer Programme - Talent Development Programmes - Niche In Uniformed Groups (Scouts| Brownies| Red Cross)

Visionstatement_Desc: A Caring School That Strives For Excellence
Missionstatement_Desc: To Nurture Our Students To Become Values-Centred Individuals And Lifelong Learners
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Anchored On Our Philosophy Of Being 'Committed To Providing An All-Round Education In A Caring Environment Aimed At Bringing Out The Best In Each And Every Child'| And Our Belief That 'Character Is The Foundation'| The School'S Distinctiveness Lies In Our Emphasis On Character Development. Being Recognised As The East Zone Centre Of Excellence For Character And Citizenship Education (Cce) Is A Testament Of This.   In Line With The Above| The School Promotes A Culture Of Care And Excellence As Articulated In The School'S Vision Of 'A Caring School That Strives For Excellence'. This Is Done Through The Adoption Of School Values Of Respect| Care| Harmony| Resilience| Responsibility And Integrity - Respect| Care And Harmony To Create A Culture Of Care And Resilience; Responsibility And Integrity To Build A Culture Of Excellence. The School Values Form The Basis On Which Good Attitudes And Behaviours Are Cultivated.  The School Also Encourages A Growth Mindset And Continually Pushes For Improvements And Innovation As Part Of Our Pursuit Of Excellence.  Emphasis On Well-Being And Growth Of Staff And Students Is Part Of Our Caring School Culture.  We Nurture A Caring Culture By Putting Our Students First And Providing For Their Socio-Emotional Needs| And Through Multiple Platforms That Involve The Curricular| Co-Curricular And Positive Relationship Building Efforts.    In Promoting Excellence Amongst Pupils| Recognition Is Given To Those Who Demonstrate Good Values As Well As Those Who Strive For Excellence And Improvements. Recognition Is Done Via Platforms Such As 'Catch Them Doing Right'| The 'Roll Of Honour' (Roh) Programme| Highlighting Of Good Behaviour At Assemblies| Academic Awards| As Well As The Edusave Character Award (Echa). The Roh Programme Recognises Students  Who Are Exemplary In The Display Of The Six School Values| And The Roh Board Highlights Those Who Have Been Exemplary In Role-Modelling The 'Value For The Month'.
Special_Sdp_Offered: To Develop Students Holistically And Build Their Strength Of Character| The School Has A Learning For Life Programme| 'Character Education Through Team Sports'.  Skills Such As Goal-Setting| Decision-Making| Communication And Problem-Solving Are Taught Through Team Sports Such As Basketball And Soccer. Students Also Develop Their Fitness While Learning To Manage Self In A Group Setting Through Fun Games| And Exercise Different Strategies To Overcome Challenges Encountered In A Game Situation. In Addition| The School Has A Myriad Of Ccas To Cater To The Different Interests And Talents Of Our Students So That They Go On To Lead Healthy And Active Lifestyles.   The School Has Embarked On A Coding Programme For The Upper Primary Students To Build Their Logical And Creative Thinking Skills. By Sequencing Codes To Activate A Robot Or Play A Game| Students Acquire Various Problem-Solving Skills That They Need In Order To Thrive In An Ever-Changing World. Beyond The Cognitive Aspects| They Would Also Learn To Work Collaboratively And Be Creators Of Technology. The Use Of Ict In A Constructivist Environment Is Part Of The School'S Effort To Make Learning Purposeful And Joyful.  To Make Learning Authentic And To Expose Our Students To Learning Beyond The Classroom| We Have Learning Journeys To Kidzania| Art Museum| The Esplanade And Sungei Buloh| Among Others. We Also Have Local And Overseas Cultural Immersion Trips So That Students Are Able To Develop Their Cross-Cultural Communication Skills. Structured Art (Digital Art| Pottery| Batik Painting) And Music (Beatboxing| Asian Percussion| Ukelele) Programmes  Are Conducted For The Students Aimed At Growing Students' Knowledge And Appreciation For The Arts.

Second_Vp_Name: Mr Abdul Mutalib B Mohammed Amin
Visionstatement_Desc: A Champion In Every Child
Missionstatement_Desc: Build Character| Challenge Minds| Enrich Lives
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: After 6 Years Of Education At Yumin Primary School| We Want Our Students To Attain A Champion Mindset - With The 'Wings And Roots' For 21St Century Learning And Living. We Have Articulated 3 Student Outcomes In Line With Moe Doe And 21St Cc| Which We Believe Will Prepare Our Champions With The Knowledge| Skills And Values Necessary For The Future:  - Confident & Effective Communicators - Critical & Creative Thinkers - Caring & Gracious Citizens  The School Endeavours To Provide A Holistic And Balanced Education For All Our Students.  Students Graduating From Yumin Primary Are Developed In The 5 Domains Of Student Development I.E. Cognitive| Social & Moral| Morale| Aesthetics & Physical| Leadership & Innovation Domains.  We Aim To Systematically Equip Our Students With The 21St Century Competencies And Develop Into  A Confident Person| A Self-Directed Learner| A Concerned Citizen And An Active Contributor.  This Is The Shared Aspiration And Responsibility Of All Staff.   The School Beliefs We Believe  - All Students Want To Learn And Can Learn| Though They May Learn Differently. - Having High Expectations Of All Our Students| Providing Them With Opportunities And Support Are The Foundations For Progress. - Teachers Make A Difference. - Quality Teaching Contributes To Good Student Discipline (In Learning And Behaviour)| And That Good Discipline Contributes To Quality Teaching And Learning. - In Teamwork And Collaboration. - A Holistic Education Best Prepares Our Students For The Future.  The School Motto: We Aspire| We Strive| We Achieve| We Serve     We Aspire To Be The Best We Can Be     We Strive With Integrity & Perseverance To Achieve Our Goals     We Serve With Respect And Compassion
Special_Sdp_Offered: The School Has Two Distinctive Programmes Outside The Core Curriculum To Provide All Students With More Varied And Authentic Learning Opportunities:   1. Project Activate Is A Structured Programme Designed To Facilitate A Progressive Values Based Learning Process That Involves Students Applying Knowledge & Skills To Real Life Situations Based On Themes And Concepts. It Incorporates Values-In-Action Which Is An Important Component In Our Character And Citizenship Education That Harnesses Pupils' Sense Of Ownership| Teamwork & Proactivity In Self-Initiating Purposeful Projects That Will Make A Difference To Others.  The Highlight Of This Programme Is The Incorporation Of A Design Thinking Protocol Which Allows The Pupils To Go Through In-Depth Inquiry| Engage In A Rigorous Process Of Asking Questions And Utilize Relevant Resources To Meet The Needs Of The Beneficiaries.  This Programme Strives To Develop Our Pupils To Have A Deep Sense Care And Belonging To The Community.  2. I3Quest Aims To Develop Critical & Creative Thinking Skills Through Progressive And Developmental Programme Focused On Computational Thinking And The Use Of Creative Computing Tools.  Pupils Acquire The Skills Of Logic| Sequencing And Create Projects Through The Use Of Programming & Coding Tool Kits.  In This Learning Process| Pupils Are Developed In 21St Century Competencies| Problems Solving Skills & Facilitated Collaborative Learning.    Another Key Programme In The School Is The Integrated Outdoor Learning Experience Programme Whereby Subject Integration Is Structured Across Primary 1 To 6. It Is Anchored By The English Curriculum And Integrated With Other Subjects Across The 6 Levels. The Pupils Are Actively Engaged In Posing Questions| Being Curious & Constructing Meaning Throughout The Learning Experience. A Key Facet Of This Outdoor Learning Is The Authentic Experiential Learning Across Subject Disciplines Supported By Exciting Ict Applications.

Visionstatement_Desc: A Vibrant Learning Community| Rooted In Values And Ready To Serve.
Missionstatement_Desc: To Nurture A Star In Every Shuqunite| Who Places Community Above Self.
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: With Its Long And Rich History And Heritage| The School Has Positioned Itself In The Community As One That Offers A Holistic| Enriching School Experience For Its Students. We Provide A Comprehensive And Exciting Learning Curriculum That Aims At Developing The Mind| Body And Soul Of Every Shuqunite. We Are Guided By The Belief That Every Student Has Unique Talents And Strengths And Our Customised Programmes   Allow Students To Realise Their Full Potential.  Our Dedicated And Caring Team Of Teachers And School Staff Are Committed In Bringing Out The Best In Our Students So That They Shine As Engaged Learners Who Are Rooted In Values And Ready To Serve.  Our Stakeholders Play An Important Part| Giving Us Firm Support In Providing A Positive Learning Environment For Our Students.
Special_Sdp_Offered: Guided By Our Icare Values| (Integrity| Care| Adaptability| Respect| And Excellence)| Our Character And Citizenship Education Programmes Aim To Develop Shuqunites Into Confident Leaders With Sound Character Who Contribute Actively To The Community. We Offer A Wide Variety Of Programmes Such As Values-In-Action (Via)| Play And Learn @Shuqun (Pal) And Values Education To Inculcate Values And Develop The Necessary Knowledge And Life Skills.   Our Learning For Life Programme (Llp) In Outdoor Education Ignites In Our Students' The Spirit Of Adventure Through Exploring Both Natural And Urbanised Environments. Using The 3L (Learning| Living And Leading) Approach| Students Go Through A Progressive Curriculum That Enable Them To Be Resourceful And Resilient As Well As Adopt A Responsible Attitude Towards The Environment.    To Nurture Students To Be World-Ready| Our School'S Unique Internationalisation Programmes Provide The Opportunities For Shuqunites To Acquire New Knowledge And Cultural Understanding To Form Lifelong Friendships As Well As Strengthen Their Identity As Singaporeans. Students Under The Student Ambassador Programme (Sap) Undergo A Unique Leadership Programme Which Aims To Develop Every Participating Student As A Good Ambassador For Singapore. Students Also Get To Play Host To Our Overseas Partner Schools Under The Reciprocal Programme| 'Friends For Life' (Learning Through International Friendship Exchange).  The School Adopts A Whole School Approach In Establishing A Vibrant Reading Culture That Prepares Students To Be Proficient And Avid Readers. The Myriad Of Reading Related Programmes And Activities Cultivate In Our Students Good Reading Habits That Not Only Improve Their Reading Comprehension And Vocabulary Skills But Stimulate Their Imagination As They Learn To Take Up Reading For Pleasure.

Visionstatement_Desc: Confident And Resilient| Creative And Thinking Pupils Who Strive To Succeed
Missionstatement_Desc: Believing And Nurturing - We Believe In Every Child And We Nurture Our Children So That They Leave Us Holding Their Heads High And Knowing That Their Future Is In Their Hands.
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: In Line With Our Mission Of "Believing And Nurturing"| We Believe That Every Child Has The Potential And Can Learn| Even Though Each Child May Come With Different Starting Points.  Hence| The School Strives To Cater To The Students' Diverse Needs; From "Stretching" The High Progress Learners To Providing The Scaffolding Support For The Low Progress Learners.  At The End Of Their Primary Education| We Want All Gespians To Be Able To Progress And Access The Many Pathways Open To Them.
Special_Sdp_Offered: To Develop 21 Cc Competencies In Our Gespians And Prepare Them For Life-Long Learning| The School'S Learning For Life Programme (Llp) Places Emphasis On The Acquisition Of Values And Life Skills Focusing On Music And The Performing Arts. The Llp Provides Students With Different Intensity Of Learning Engagement According To Their Levels. In The Cognitive Domain| Varied Learning Activities Are Planned| Ranging From The Math Olympiad And Code For Fun For The High Progress Learners To Motivational Programmes And Additional Support In-And After-School For Low Progress Learners. In Pal| P1 And P2 Students Are Exposed To Various Modules| Such As  Visual Arts And Outdoor Education Modules. They Are Designed To Be Experiential| Enjoyable And Encompass Learning In A Creative Way; Incorporating Values And Social And Emotional Learning. These Pal Activities Have Also Been Scaled Up To Benefit The P3 And P4 Students. Students With Potential Are Identified And Encouraged To Join The Related Ccas. Opportunities Are Also Created To Allow Them To Engage In Informal/Formal Performances To Build Their Confidence And Showcase Their Talents.     In Line With The National Movement To Keep Singapore Clean And Engender A Sense Of Ownership And Loyalty To School And Nation| We Have Partnered With Nea To Raise Students' Environmental Awareness And Engage Them In The Routinised Cleaning Of Their Classrooms And Surrounding Areas. Learning Journeys (Local/Overseas) Are Organised For Students To Experience Different Cultures And Lifestyles And In The Process| Appreciate Singapore Better. Opportunities Are Also Created With External Partners To Give Students The Opportunities To Practise What They Have Learned Through The School Via Programme. We Will Continue To Strive To Create A Nurturing Environment Where Gespians Who Pass Through Our Hands Are Developed Into "Confident And Resilient| Creative And Thinking Pupils Who Strive To Succeed".

Visionstatement_Desc: A Healthy| Confident| Gracious And Morally Upright Pupil With A Passion For Learning And Love For Singapore.
Missionstatement_Desc: To Provide A Safe And Happy Environment For Our Pupils To Strive Towards Excellence.
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Gongshang Primary School Is A School With A Rich Tradition And Illustrious History. Founded In 1920| The School Had Its Humble Beginnings As A Night School| Known As The Chinese Industrial And Commercial Continuation School Which Catered To The Needs Of The Young Migrants From China| Incorporating Vocational Training Into Its Basic Curriculum. Gongshang Primary Has Continued With The Rich Traditions Of Its History| Emphasizing A Strong Asian Tradition And Culture.   We Believe That Every Child Can Thrive In A Safe And Nurturing Environment To Become Confident| Gracious And Morally Upright Pupils Who Will Be Able To Contribute To Society With A Sense Of Purpose And Able To Meet The Challenges Of The Future. The Broad-Based And Value-Added Curriculum Emphasising On The Holistic Development Of Every Child Is Specially Tailored To Ignite His Or Her Passion And Stretch The Abilities And Talents Whilst Anchored On The School'S Core Values Of Respect| Integrity| Perseverance And Thrift.   Teachers Will Continue To Be At The Forefront Of Pedagogical Innovations| Harnessing Technology And Working In Close Partnership With Our Key Partners| The School Advisory Committee (Sac)| Parent Support Group (Psg)| The School Alumni As Well As Other Parents To Nurture Every Child To Help Him Or Her Realise His Or Her Full Potential.
Special_Sdp_Offered: At Gongshang Primary| We Are Committed To Providing All Students With A Holistic Education Through Our Student-Centric Holistic Curriculum. The School'S Instructional Programmes Are Customised To Cater To The Needs Of Our Students Through A Myriad Of Student-Centred Approaches And Diverse Learning Experiences Focusing On Development Of The 21St Century Competencies. We Are Committed To Providing Our Students An Education In Which Academic Learning Is Well-Balanced With Character Building And Co-Curricular Activities. The School'S Learning For Life Programme (Llp)| Character Through Sports| Is Drawn Up Based On A 6-Year Progressive Programme Outcome.  It Provides All Pupils With Authentic Learning Experiences To Hone Their Social Emotional Competencies To Demonstrate The Core Values Of Responsibility| Integrity| Care| Resilience| Teamwork And Harmony. This Is Done Through 3 Domains Of Learning| Namely Cognitive| Affective And Psychomotor. Through Experiential And Authentic Learning| Both Local And Overseas| These Domains Will Be Nurtured Through The 3 Main Thrusts| That Is| Sports & Games| Outdoor Education And Leadership To Ensure Pervasiveness And Porosity. Anchored On The Character Through Sports Framework| The Focus Is Based On A Tiered Approach| That Is| Catering To The Entire Cohort At Lower Primary (Primary 1 And 2)| Level Specific Customised Approach At Primary 2 And 3| Culminating To Specialised And Focused Training For Identified Students At Primary 4 To 6. Customised Programmes Such As The Cohort Level Camps At Primary 4 And Primary 6| Values-In-Action Programmes And Cross Cultural Experiences  Reinforce The Learning Through Providing Opportunities For Students To Step Out Of Their Comfort Zone To Challenge Themselves To Be Creative Thinkers Who Are Independent| Resilient| Respectful And Are Able To Work Collaboratively  In Teams.

Visionstatement_Desc: Caring Thinkers; Adventurous Learners; Passionate Contributors.
Missionstatement_Desc: Nurturing Hearts; Enriching Minds; Inspiring Growth
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: School Philosophy Every Child Has Intrinsic Worth; Every Child Can And Wants To Learn;  Every Child Can Contribute As A Gracious And Responsible Citizen Of The World.   Bringing Out The Best In Every Child Every Student An Engaged Learner - We Seek To Foster The Joy Of Learning And Provide Quality Holistic Education Where Students Enjoy Learning| Are Motivated To Pursue Their Interests And Go On To Fulfil Their Full Potential.  Every Teacher A Caring Educator - Teachers Lead| Care And Inspire By Word And Deed| Through The Care We Give.   Every Parent A Supportive Partner - Parents Complement The Good Work Of Our Teachers And Bring Encouragement| Inspiration And Wisdom To The Child'S Learning Journey.   Engaging Community As Partners - Harnessing Supportive Partners In Creating Opportunities For Every Student To Learn For Mastery| Learn Throughout Life And Learn Purposefully And Meaningfully.  School Values - H.E.A.R.T Healthy Lifestyle Everyone Is Special A Love For Learning Responsible And Respectful Teamwork Is Our Culture  Culture Of Excellence And Learning  The Culture Of Excellence Fosters The Attitude Of Doing Our Best And Looking For Ways To Improve And Do Better. It Is Helping One Another Be The Best That We Can Be. This Is Align To The School'S Motto Of Aspire To Excel.  The Culture Of Learning Encourages The School To Develop As A Learning Organisation That Seeks To Foster A Culture Of Continuous Questioning And Refreshing Of What We Know| And The Organisational Practice Of Helping Every Individual| Staff And Students| To Develop Throughout Life.
Special_Sdp_Offered: 1)Llp Visual Arts (Llp Va) As Part Of The Visual Arts (Va) Curriculum| The C.A.P.S (Creative Arts Programme) Provides The Opportunity For All Students To Experience A Comprehensive Range Of Visual Arts Proficiencies. These Include Ceramics| Print Making| Clay Tile Relief| Sculpture And Art Appreciation. Integrated Project Work In The Va Curriculum Engages Students In Their Arts Learning Experiences| Through Collaboration And Active Learning. These Projects Help Our Students To Deepen Their Learning And Allow Them To Make Meaningful Connections Between The Various Subjects| Such As Recycling In Science| Culture And Values In Cce And Digital Art In Ict. Through These Projects| Students Embrace Diversity| Become More Aware Of The Environmental Issues| And Better Understand The Various Cultures.  2)Llp Nurturing Caring Thinkers| Adventurous Learners And Passionate Contributors (Llp T-Caps) @Huamin Through Community Service & Student Leadership Development In Education For Sustainable Development (Esd). Hmps Is The First Unesco Associated Schools Project Network| Or Aspnet School In Singapore. The School'S Focus Is On Esd| Namely In The Domains Of Culture And Environment. It Encompasses The School'S Efforts In Developing 21Cc| Encouraging The Arts And Culture| As Well As In Promoting And Keeping The Environment Clean And Green. The Focus On Community Service And Student Leadership Will Thus Support And Strengthen Our Efforts Towards Esd.  3)Project Work Hmps Students Apply The Protocols Of Design Thinking To Work On A Particular Design Challenge. In The Process| They Build On 21Cc Such As Effective Communication And Collaboration| As Well As Internalise Values| Mindsets And Behaviours Of A Design Thinker Whilst Acquiring Relevant And New Knowledge To Solve Real-World Problems. Engaging In The Design Thinking Process To Address An Issue They Encounter Also Helps Develop Empathy For Others And Hence Ignite The Desire To Contribute To The Betterment Of The Community.

Visionstatement_Desc: Every Xishanite| A Lifelong Learner| A Contributing Citizen
Missionstatement_Desc: To Create Opportunities Where Passions Are Ignited| Potentials Discovered And Dreams Realised.
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Our School Philosophy That Every Child Is Important And Every Child Can Learn Guides All Staff To Recognise That Every Child Has His Unique Strengths And Capabilities. We Strive To Know And Grow Our Pupils To Discover Their Individual  Strengths And Develop Them To Reach Their Fullest Potential Within A Supportive Environment.     In Line With Our Mission| We Seek To Create Opportunities To Bring Out The Best In Every Child  Through Varied Learning Programmes And Experiences. Anchored On A Strong Professional Ethos| Our Teachers Build Up Every Child In A Caring And Nurturing Environment With High Expectations For Our Pupils' Holistic Development| So That Every Child Grows To Be A Life-Long Learner And Contributing Citizen. We Seek To Build An Inviting School Where All Our Pupils Appreciate A Quality School Experience| Exhibit The Joy Of Learning And Embrace The School Values Of Self-Discipline| Integrity| Resilience And Respect.    The School Prides Itself In Living Out A Strong Community Spirit| In Line With Our Motto Of "Love| Care| Share" Following That Of Our School Founding Pioneers| Through Our Active Community Involvement.
Special_Sdp_Offered: The School Believes That Academic Learning And Character Building Are Equally Important In Developing The Whole Child.     Our Learning For Life Programme (Llp)| Empowerment Through Sports Education| Aims To Equip Every Pupil With Mental Skills That Will Shape A Positive Mindset And Be Guided By Positive Habits Of Mind To Demonstrate Good Values And Strong Character.  Delivered Via Our Xishan'S Physical Education Curriculum And Sports & Games Modules| And Integrated Into The School'S Total Curriculum| Pupils' Acquisition And Practice Of Mental Skills Will Be Manifested Through Changing Attitudes| Mindsets And Habits| Thereby Shaping Their Disposition And Build Their Competencies To Meet Varied Situations That They Might Encounter In Life.      Environmental Education Is A Strong Tenet In The School To Promote A Strong Sense Of Community Responsibility| Values Inculcation And Resource Conservation.

Visionstatement_Desc: Every Child An Engaged Learner| A Caring Citizen And A Steadfast Leader
Missionstatement_Desc: Together| We Nurture And Inspire An Inclusive Spirit.
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: School Philosophy: Every One Can Learn| Love And Lead  School Culture: The School Embraces A Culture Of Care| Innovation And Discipline| Where Discipline Is Unpacked As Having The 'Disciplined People| Disciplined Thoughts| And Disciplined Actions'.
Special_Sdp_Offered: Excellence In Character Development At Princess Elizabeth Primary School| Students Are At The Heart Of Our Efforts In Developing Their Character. These Efforts Have Been Affirmed By The Ministry Of Education Which Awarded Us With The Outstanding Development Award (Character Development) And Designated Our School As The West Zone Centre Of Excellence For Character Development (Wz Coe For Cd).   As The Wz Coe For Cd| Peps Serves As An Anchor School In The West Zone To Leverage On And Develop Their Niche| Culture And Excellence In Cd. This Includes The Development Of Teachers Through Sharing Best Practices In Character And Citizenship Education (Cce) Workshops| Customised Programmes And Sharing Of Cce Resources For Teaching Of Core Values And Social And Emotional (Se) Competencies. These Authentic Resources Are Created By Our Own Teachers And Students. We Also Provide Platform To Nurture Student Leaders In Primary Schools In West Zone Through Workshop Or Camp To Support The Development Of Student Leadership.   Learning For Life Programme (Llp) Aspire To Serve And Lead In Alignment With Our School Vision | 'Every Child| An Engaged Learner| A Caring Citizen And A Steadfast Leader| The Focus Of Our Llp Would Be On Imbuing Our Students With Our School'S Core Values Of Ambition| Self-Discipline| Perseverance| Integrity| Respect And Empathy (Aspire). This Is Achieved Through Community Service And Tiered Student Leadership Development Via Our Values In Action (Via) Programme. The Ultimate Aim Is To Lay A Solid Foundation For Our Students To Appreciate The Value Of Citizen Leadership In Caring For Others Within The Community.

Visionstatement_Desc: Achievers Rooted In Values| Soaring Beyond Limits
Missionstatement_Desc: To Nurture And Inspire Pupils To Be Self-Directed Learners| Gracious And Resilient| Serving Beyond Self
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Dazhong Primary School (Dzps) Has A Long History Of Almost 80 Years. Anchored On Our Firm Belief That Every Child Can Learn And Give Of One'S Best| We Strive To Groom Every Student To Serve Beyond Oneself And Faces Challenges With Resilience.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     A Student-Centric Approach Is Adopted In Designing Our Holistic Curriculum To Help Every Student Live Out Our School'S Values Of 'Ireap': 'Integrity| Responsibility| Excellence| Acceptance And Perseverance'. Our Six-Year Structured Curriculum Through Our Llp-Arts Education Programme Offers A Myriad Of Learning Experiences Which Help To Cultivate In Every Student| 'Howard Gardner'S 5 Minds For The Future' - The Disciplinary Mind| The Synthesizing Mind| The Creating Mind| The Respectful Mind & The Ethical Mind'.  This Prepares Them To Be Self-Directed Learners| Gracious And Resilient Citizens Who Seek To Serve Beyond Self For The Future.                                                                                                                                                                                       Coupled With A Warm And Caring Environment Afforded By A Team Of Committed Staff| We Believe That Our Students Can Become 'Achievers Rooted In Values| Soaring Beyond Limits'.
Special_Sdp_Offered: Learning For Life Programme (Llp):  Developing 21St Century Competencies Through Arts Education Programme@Dazhong (Aep@Dzps). Our Signature Programme Aims To Develop Our Students To Be Future Ready. We Are Also The Only Primary School In Singapore To Have A Junior Orchestra Talent Development Programme Supported By The Moe Arts Education Branch.  Character & Citizenship Development:  Resilience@Dzps Via Outdoor Education Programme (Oep) Aims To Build Resilience And 'Gritty' Children Through A Longitudinal Oep| Where Students Undergo Rugged And Authentic Learning Experiences To Develop Character| Strength And Tenacity. Other Character Development Programmes Include 'Myceed@Dzps - Character And Citizenship Programme| Ne Current Buzz| Gratitude Journalling & Servant Leadership Development Programme Through Ilead (Leadership Experience At Dazhong).  Cognitive (Critical & Inventive Thinking Development):  Beyond Supporting The Students' Development In Literacy And Numeracy. Students Are Exposed To Other Stretch Programmes Such As Fun With Coding Programme To Develop Computational Thinking Skills| Science Learning Through The  I- Experience Programme| Literacy Programmes Such As Writing With Purpose & The Math Mastery Programme.

First_Vp_Name: Mdm Sharifah Fairuz Bte S Y A
Visionstatement_Desc: Empowered Learners| Persons Of Strength And Character
Missionstatement_Desc: To Empower Bgpians To Learn How To Learn And Succeed| And Nurture Them To Be Confident Persons And Concerned Citizens.
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Bedok Green Primary'S Philosophy That 'Every Child Matters' Undergirds Our Unyielding Belief That Every Child Is Special| Valuable And Important| And Thus Will Receive The Necessary Support To Ensure His Success In Life| Regardless Of His Starting Point| With Many Helping Hands| Sound Structures And A Myriad Of Programmes For Various Student Segments Put In Place. We Build The Students' Resilience| Confidence And Strong Thirst For Success| Despite The Challenges And Obstacles| Always Cheered On And Encouraged By Their Teachers And Peers. The School Philosophy Unites The School As One| As Every Member Of The School Community Takes Accountability Of His Role In Ensuring Individual And Collective Success. We Also Ensure That Students Learn In A Warm| Nurturing And Conducive Environment For Their Holistic Development.   The Philosophy Also Drives The School'S Strong Culture Of Care For Its Students| Staff And Stakeholders. Every Member Of The School Community Is Respected And Recognised For His Contribution| Big Or Small| With Ample Opportunities To Succeed. Character-Building And Values-In-Action Programmes Focus On Contributing To Their Peers| The School And Community| Reiterating The Importance Of Giving Generously Back To Society| In Our Own Ways.
Special_Sdp_Offered: Learning For Life Programme Sports To Reinforce Values Education (Strive @ Bgps): Strive @ Bgps Taps On Key Platforms Such As Physical Education Lessons| Co-Curricular Activities (Cca) And Outdoor Education Programmes To Inculcate Values In Students So As To Develop Their Character And Citizenship| As Well As Hone Their Social-Emotional (Sel) And 21St Century Competencies.    Innovations In The Use Of Information And Communication Technology (Ict) In Teaching And Learning: As Part Of Its Efforts To Achieve Its Vision Of Empowered Learners| These Ict Initiatives Encourage Students To Be Self-Directed And Collaborative Learners.  Flipped Learning: In The Flipped Classroom Model| Students View Video Lectures At Home To Prepare For Lessons The Next Day| And Arrive In Class Ready To Discuss| Analyse And Apply The Information They Had Already Learned. Teachers Are Skilful Facilitators Who Engage Students In Robust Discussions And Meaningful Activities In A Student-Centric Classroom.  Mobile Learning: Students Have The Opportunity To Learn Using Mobile Devices Like Ipads| Making Their Learning Experiences Authentic And Tactile With The Aim To Have Higher Student Engagement Levels During Lessons And Improved Student Ahicvements.  Curriculum Experience Day: The Curriculum Experience Day Presents Our Students With Opportunities To Be Immersed In A Day Of Exciting And Innovative Activities Which Promote Critical And Creative Thinking. Parents Also Have A Chance To Be In School To Learn Alongside With Their Children And Understand The School'S Curriculum Offerings Better Through These Bonding Activities.

Visionstatement_Desc: Hearts Of Service| Minds Of Inquiry| Joy In Learning| Confidence In Life
Missionstatement_Desc: Together| We Bring Out The Best In Every Child For A Better Nation
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: In Lianhua| We Believe That School Should Not Just Be About Academic Excellence. To Better Prepare Our Students For A Future That Is More Dynamic And Complex| We Must Focus On The All-Round Development Of Students| And Equip Them With The Skills| Attitudes And Values To Be Future-Ready - Students Who Will Grow Into Confident Citizens Who Chart Their Own Paths And Create Their Own Successes.  Our School Vision Is Hearts Of Service| Minds Of Inquiry| Joy In Learning| Confidence In Life.  Through 'Hearts Of Service'| We Want To Nurture Our Students To Be Caring And Compassionate Towards Others| To Know That Regardless Of Their Circumstance| They Can Do Their Part To Make A Difference To The People Around Them.  'Minds Of Inquiry' Is About Seeking Knowledge And Learning To Think Creatively And Critically Which Is An Important 21St Century Competency. We Want Our Students To Be Curious About The World And Things Around Them. Learning Is No Longer Something That Just Takes Place In School. During This Time| Where Change Is Happening So Rapidly| Our Hope Is For Our Students To Find 'Joy In Learning' And To Continue To Learn Throughout Life.  We Want Out Students To Grow Up To Be Useful And Contributing Citizens Who Are Confident And Have A Strong Belief In Their Self-Worth. Thus| 'Confidence In Life'.  Our School Mission Is Together We Bring Out The Best In Every Child For A Better Nation.  Together Is Important As It Is Our Belief That The School Cannot Do It Alone. We Must Establish Strong Partnerships With Parents And The Community To Bring Up Every Child Together. Every Child Is Unique With Their Own Interests| Talents And Aspirations| And We Want To Bring Out The Best In Every Child| To Guide And Nurture Them To Their Fullest Potential. Our Pisa (Physical| Intellectual| Social-Moral & Aesthetics) Framework Guides Us To Create All-Round Quality School Experiences For Our Students And To Nurture Their Talents In Their Pursuit Of Being The Best They Can Be.
Special_Sdp_Offered: Our Llp| Values In Action Through Sports Aims To Nurture Students Into Engaged Learners Who Adopt A Healthy Lifestyle And Develop Joy In Learning; Contributing Team Players Who Contribute By Serving Others And Promoting Teamwork; And Confident Leaders Who Display Self-Confidence And Leadership. Through Sports| Experiences Are Created For Students To Put Our School Values Into Action. For Students Who Excelled| Their Passion And Skills Are Honed In Our Sports Talent Management Programme. Our Alp| Rite@Lianhua (Robotics|Info-Technology Education) Takes An Integrated Approach For Students To Learn 21Cc Skills In Critical And Inventive Thinking| Info-Tech Literacy And Communication. Through Rite| Students Experience And Develop Their Interest And Aptitude For Coding And Robotics. Our School Is Piloting The National Junior Coding Standards To Accredit Students' Coding Skills To Provide Them With Insights On Their Progression. We Believe That 'Every Student Can Lead' And Thus Provide Opportunities For Every Student To Become An Empowered Leader Who Lives Out Our School Vision 'Hearts Of Service'. In-House Training Is Conducted To Equip Students With The Skills To Lead Self And Others In Service To The School And To The Community. A Signature Programme In The Aesthetics Domain In Our Young Composers Programme. Students Are Guided To Compose Songs About Values And Friendship That Shape The Lianhua Identity. It Also Complements Our Efforts To Create A Singing Culture In Our School As We Believe That Singing Is A Natural| Creative And Powerful Way To Engage Students In Learning About Values And Life. The Young Explorer Scientist (Yes!) Programme Shows Our Strong Emphasis On Engaging Students To Appreciate And Be Excited About Nature. With Our Vast Resource Of Gardens| Animal Enclosures And Ponds In The School| Students Learn Science In An Authentic And Fun Way| Being Up Close With Nature. Also Weaved Into The Curriculum Are Our Fish Breeding And Indoor Hydroponics Programmes.

Visionstatement_Desc: A Learner . A Thinker . A Leader
Missionstatement_Desc: Ignite Passion For Learning| Nurture Strength Of Character
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: The School Strongly Believes In Delivering Holistic Education To Better Prepare Our Children For The Future. Beyond The Academics And Examinations| We Believe Children Need To Find Joy In Learning And Be Grounded In The Right Values To Help Strengthen The Singapore Spirit In Them. We Also Believe In Building Resilience Among Our Students| So They Will Develop A Spirit Of Daring To Try And To Explore. These| We Believe| Are Competencies That Will Equip Them For Work And For Life.
Special_Sdp_Offered: The School'S Lifelong Learning Programme (Llp) Is In Environmental Education (Ee). Through This| Pupils Are Exposed To Progressive Level-Appropriate Learning Of Ee Issues Integrated With The Learning Of Leadership Skills| Values And Community Involvement. The School Has Embarked On A Concerted Effort To Design For Active Learning Involving Deep Thinking And Collaborative Learning Supported By Ict. It Is Currently Working With Educational Partners On A Project Called "Making The Invisible Visible In Science (Mivis)" Where Collaborative And Inquiry-Learning Pedagogical Approaches Are Used In P3 Science Lessons Supported By The Provision Of Mobile Devices. Through The Project| Which Will Be Scaled To Other Levels And Subjects| The School Hopes To Strengthen 21St Century Competencies In Students. A Differentiated And Targeted Approach Is Adopted To Help Pupils With Various Learning Profiles. High-Progress Pupils Go Through Enrichment Programmes Such As Literature Alive And Maths Stretch. Pupils With Learning Difficulties And Special Needs Are Assisted By Remediation| Reading Remediation Programme (Rrp)| School-Based Dyslexia Remediation Programme (Sdr)| Improving Confidence And Achievement In Numeracy (Ican) Programme| Aed-Supported Pull-Outs And Morning Extensive Reading. Peri Holistic Assessment Approaches Have Become De Rigueur At P1 To P6 Levels| Providing Timely And Useful Feedback For Students To Work On Improvement Areas. The School Also Organises A Mid-Year Student-Led Parent-Teacher Conferencing To Enable Students To Reflect On And Communicate Their Progress To Parents. To Allow Students To Explore Learning Beyond Their Textbooks| The School Organises Inter-Disciplinary Project Work For The P5 And P6 Students. These Are Intentionally Linked To The School'S Llp Of Ee And Our Cce Intent To Make Students Socially Responsible. Students Explore Ways To Reuse And Recycle Materials And Use Them At The Annual Fiesta Carnival To Raise Funds For Charitable Organisations.

First_Vp_Name: Mdm Josephine Ong Mrs Ng Hang Seng
Visionstatement_Desc: A School With P.R.I.D.E. * *Perseverance; Respect; Integrity; Diligence; Empathy
Missionstatement_Desc: Building Character| Enriching Lives| Stretching Potential
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: At Peiying Primary School| The Underpinning Philosophy Of Teaching And Learning Is The Belief That Every Child Can Learn| Improve And Fulfil His Potential To Become Contributing Citizens.   Central To The Peiying Brand Of Education Is The Nurture Of Individuals Who Would Be Leaders Of Character| Engaged And Resilient Learners And Caring Citizens. At Peiying Primary School| We Look For The Strengths In Our Students And We Strive To Help Our Students Realise Their Full Potential. Each Child Is Respected As An Individual And Nurtured To Grow And Develop. Our Students Learn To Give Their Best In All That They Do| To Persevere And To 'Never Give Up'. The School Focuses On Character Building And On The Inculcation Of Values Such As Honesty And Development Of Respect And Care For The People Around Them.  Students Of Peiying Enjoy A Wide Variety Of Programmes That Contribute To Their Holistic Development. Student Development Programmes In The School Are Specially Planned And Designed To Stretch The Potential In Each And Every Child To Make Learning At Peiying Fun And Meaningful.
Special_Sdp_Offered: Scale@Peiying: Scale@Peiying Is A 6-Year Learning For Life Programme (Llp) That Focuses On Sports| Character Development And Adventure Learning. The Llp Provides Students With Real-Life Experiential Learning To Develop Their Character And Values| Cultivate Positive Attitudes| Self-Expression And Strengthen Their Interaction Skills. Peiying Has Its Own Adventure Tower That Enables The School To Carry Out Outdoor Adventure Activities Regularly On The School Premises.   Code For Fun: All P3 & P4 Students Go Through A Robotics Programme That Spans Two Years. Students Start Learning The Fundamentals Of Computational Thinking At Primary 3 And The Programme Is Continued At Primary 4. This Programme Offers A Fun And Interactive Way For Students To Learn Programming Skills.  It Also Enhances Logical Thinking| Analytical Skills And Help Students Learn To Organise Data.    Project Work: Project Work Provides P3 To P6 Students With The Opportunity To Synthesise Knowledge From Various Areas Of Learning| And Apply It To Real Life Situations. Participation In Project Work Enhances Students' Knowledge And Enables Them To Acquire 21St Century Competencies Such As Collaboration| Communication And Independent Learning. It Prepares Them For Lifelong Learning And To Face Future Challenges.    Ace Programme: Arts And Cultural Experiences (Ace) Provides Different Platforms For Our Students To Be Immersed In The Culture And Arts Of The Different Community Groups. Students Learn To Appreciate Our Diverse Cultural Heritage Through Activities That Range From Learning To Play In A Kompang Group To Picking Up Chinese Opera Skills.   Hydroponics & Aeroponics Programme: Peiying Adopts An Experiential Approach To The Learning Of Science. As Part Of The Process Of Learning About Plants| Students Grow Vegetables Using Hydroponics And Aeroponics. The Vegetables That Are Harvested Are Distributed To Needy Families In The Neighbourhood And Adds A 'Values-In-Action' Dimension To The Programme.

Visionstatement_Desc: Enlightened Students| Enriched Citizens
Missionstatement_Desc: Connecting Hearts| Engaging Minds
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: We Believe That (1) Every Child Can Learn| Whatever His Starting Point.  We Will Help Each Child Find Success In Learning.  (2)  Every Child Is Unique. Each Child Will Therefore Succeed In Different Ways.  (3)  Every Child Needs Different Attributes To Succeed In The Future.  We Will Nurture The Whole Child.   We Provide A Caring And Supportive Environment For Our Students With A Focus On Connecting Hearts And Engaging Minds.
Special_Sdp_Offered: Learning Comes Alive For Kemingnites Through Authentic Learning@Keming.   Learning Beyond School - Students Go For Two Or More Learning Journeys A Year.  These Learning Journeys Help Make Meaning Of What They Learn In The Classroom As They Experience Different Places| People And Environments.  An Example Is The Visit To A Shopping Mall By The P1 Students.  Students Learn The Value Of Money And The Basics Of Budgeting As They Plan Their Purchases Within The Constraints Given.  The Joy Of Learning Is Evident As The Students| Guided By Parent Volunteers And Their Teachers| Make New Discoveries Together. Learning By Doing - We Provide Opportunities For Students To Engage In Hands-On And Collaborative Learning To Evoke Their Curiosity And Apply Their Learning. P1 And P2 Students Engage In Hands-On Activities Such As Bubble-Blowing| Ice-Cream Decoration And Food Tasting.  P3 To P6 Students| On The Other Hand| Engage In Project Work To Enable Them To Make Meaningful Connections Of What They Have Learnt.   Cultivating The Student Voice - To Build Confident And Effective Leaders Who Contribute Actively To Society| Platforms Are Created To Cultivate The Student Voice And Encourage Self-Expression And Participation. My School My Voice| A Shared Space In The School For Students To Post Their Opinions| Have Witnessed Contemplations Over Various Issues.  Arts4U Is A Platform Where Students Sign Up To Showcase Their Talents. During Kids Buzz| Students Present On A Topic Of Their Choice And Invite Questions From The Audience. These Activities Get The Creative Juices Flowing And Develop The Confidence Of The Students.  Student Leaders Also Participate In School Improvement Through Student-Initiated Projects. The Exhale-Ration Fair Is When P6 Students Are Given The Opportunity To Explore In Teams| Innovative Ideas Within Set Conditions.  The Process Invokes The Entrepreneurial Dare Within The Students And Pushes The Boundaries Of Their Thinking.

Visionstatement_Desc: Learners With Passion| Citizens Of Honour
Missionstatement_Desc: To Instil The Love For Learning And Nurture All-Round Individuals| Grounded By Values
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: The School'S Mission States Its Commitment To Instilling In Every Child A Zeal For Learning| Embracing Innovation In Teaching And Learning And Developing Upright And Responsible Citizens.  The School Values Of Patriotism| Resilience| Integrity| Discipline And Empathy (Pride)| Are In Alignment With Its Vision.   Changkat Primary Is Committed To Delivering A Student-Centric| Values-Driven Education For All Her Students Through The Provision Of A Differentiated Curriculum Where Teachers Provide For Different Learner Types. Learner Information Such As That Obtained From Formative Assessments Is Actively Sought To Enable Responsive Teaching And Active Learning. To Create A Sense Of Autonomy And Ownership| Students Are Involved In Tracking| Reflecting On And Following Up On Their Areas For Improvement And Strengths.   In The Area Of Pastoral Care| We Strive To Provide Multiple Platforms Which Encourage Positive Teacher-Student Interactions. This Ensures Timely Gathering Of Student Information To Improve Support Structures And Processes. The School Also Leverages Students As A Resource Base To Beef Up Pastoral Support For All Children. All These Serve To Create An Environment That Is Secure And Conducive For Learning And Play.  Changkat Primary Provides A Total Curriculum That Nurtures The Whole Child. We Believe That The School Curriculum And Programmes Need To Be Supported By Strong Home-School Collaboration For Greater Effectiveness. Through Multiple Communication Platforms| We Ensure That Parents Are Provided With Useful And Timely Information About School Policies And Activities. This Encourages Active Participation From Parents In Their Child'S School Life And Facilitates Fruitful Partnership Between Parents And Teachers To Meet The Needs Of Every Child.
Special_Sdp_Offered: The School'S Learning For Life Programme| Soar@Ckps(Sports| Outdoor| Athletics| Recreation At Changkat Pr)| Creates Rich Learning Opportunities And Experiences To Develop The Child Physically| Mentally And Emotionally So That He/She Goes On To Lead A Healthy And Active Lifestyle. Through Skilful Questioning| Teachers Draw Out Student Learning In Values And Life Skills Such As Problem-Solving| Communication And Teamwork.  Soar@Ckp Seeks To Provide Students With A Comprehensive Sporting And Outdoor Experience While Giving Opportunities To Those With Greater Interest And/Or Aptitude To Pursue Their Strengths And Interest Further. This Is Done Through A Structured Pe Program(P1-6)| Program For Active Learning(P1-2)| Modular Co-Curricular Activities(P3-6) And Co-Curricular Activities(P3-6).  Learning Fiesta Is A Week-Long Event In The School Calendar Where The Various Academic Departments Collaborate To Put Up Engaging Learning Activities In A Carnival-Like Atmosphere. Technology Is Leveraged To Increase The Fun Element. Prior To The Event| Students Earn Tokens To Play At The Game Stations From Their Teachers Through Demonstration Of Good Character Traits Such As Responsibility And Empathy. Another Event Popular With Students Is The Annual Social Enterprise Day (Sed)| Where Students Of Graduating Classes Plan And Set Up A Variety Of Games And Handicraft Stalls For Their Schoolmates (P1-5). Sed  Enables Our Students To Show Care And Contribute Actively To The Community; Trains Our Students To Be Responsible; Promotes Team Work| Innovation And Enterprise In Our Students; And Provides Our Students With A Safe Environment For Risk-Taking And Application Of Business Strategies. Proceeds From The Sale Of Coupons Are Donated To A Charity Identified By The Student Organizers. Past Charities Include Club Rainbow And Children'S Cancer Foundation.

Visionstatement_Desc: Every Student Of Zhenghua Is Of Good Character| And Is Academically And Culturally Vibrant.
Missionstatement_Desc: Through A Dynamic School Culture And A Caring Environment| Every Student Is Nurtured And His/Her Potential Developed So That He/She Grows Up To Be A Good Person And Useful Citizen.
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: We Believe That Every Child Can Learn And Is Capable Of Achieving His/ Her Personal Best - The Best That We Can Be.  We Offer A Student-Centric And Values Driven Education That Helps Develop Out Students To Be Ready For A Volatile| Uncertain| Complex And Ambiguous (Vuca) World. At The End Of Our 6 Year| Students Would Be Able To Identify Their Strengths| Discover Their Potential And Not Be Afraid Of Failure.  The Notion 'Staff Our Key; Students Our Focus' Continues To Be The Nucleus Of The School Culture Framework. Through Culture Of Care| Students Are Guided By Values To Do The Right Things| Even When No One Is Watching. Staff Are Good Role Models And Will Go The Extra Mile Whenever The Need Arises. Through Culture Of Learning| Students Are Motivated To Learn| To Do Their Personal Best| Engage In All School Learning Activities And In Displaying Their 21St Cc Skills. Staff Will Continually Seek To Improve Themselves| Provide A Holistic Learning Experience For All| And Will Prepare Students For The Changing Landscape. Through Culture Of Innovation| Students Will Be Creative In Thinking While Staff Will Seek Continuous Improvement. The Culture Of Collaboration Will Allow Our Students To Go Out To The Society To Learn| Give Back And Cultivate Good Team Values While Staff Will Seek Opportunities For Professional And Students' Growth.  In The School Vision| The Term 'Good Character' Continues To Be Predominantly Placed Before Other Traits To Signal Our School'S Deep Rooted Belief That Character Development Is Essential To Become 'The Best That We Can Be'. The School Strives To Care For The Overall Well-Being Of Our Students| Mould Their Character And Citizenship And To Inspire Self-Leadership In Our Students.  Over The Years| Our Students Have Done Well In The Academic And Non-Academic Domains; Attributed To The Hard Work Of A Nurturing Team Of Dedicated Teachers| Committed Non-Teaching Staff| Supportive Sac| Parents| Community And Our Students' Belief In Themselves.
Special_Sdp_Offered: Character Education Takes Centre Stage In The School'S Overall Development Of Our Students. We Strongly Believe In Instilling A Set Of Strong Fundamental Values That Would Serve As A Moral Compass To Guide Them In Life. Values-Driven Education Is Infused Across All Ip1 And Ip2 Subjects. Co-Curricular Activity (Cca) Is Driven By 'Character| Camaraderie And Attitude' - A Mindset That Have Led Cca Groups In Zhps To Attain Milestone Successes In Performing Arts| Sports| And Clubs. The School Learning For Life Programme Is Dare (Dance Arts Education@Zhenghua)| Which Aims To Build Character| Imbue The School Values| Inculcate A Habit Of Graciousness| Equip Students With Thinking Skills And Provide Opportunities For Personal Excellence For All Students. To Promote Sports Education| Participation And Physical Fitness| The School Carries Out Sports Education Programmes (Sep) Held In Collaboration With The S'Pore Sports Council; With The Aim To Improve Self-Esteem| Nurture Our Students' Life Skills Through Sports And Encourage Students To Cultivate A Lifelong Interest In Healthy Recreational Activities. To Expose The Students On Environmental Issues| The Extensive "Care For The Environment" Programme Lends Itself To Enhancing Character Development Through Caring For Others And The Environment At Large. Green Ambassadors And Environment Champions Are Selected To Share On The Importance Of Caring For The Environment With Their Peers Periodically.  The School Is A Firm Believer That Every Child In Zhps Should Not Be Denied Opportunities Of An Overseas Learning Experience (Ole). Through The School'S Ole Programmes| Students Are Given The Opportunity To Have An Overseas Experience Through Cultural Immersion Trips Or Exchange Programmes That Contribute To The Holistic Development Of The Students By Exposing Them To A Different Environment And Culture.  The 6 Year Experience Will Ensure That Every Student Of Zhenghua Is Of Good Character| And Is Academically And Culturally Vibrant.

Visionstatement_Desc: A School Of Passionate Learners With A Heart To Serve.
Missionstatement_Desc: Inspiring Minds| Moulding Character.
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Every Child - His Personal Best' - South View Primary School (Svps) Guides Its Pupils Towards Excellence With The Belief That Every Child Is Different | Can Learn And That He Can Achieve His Personal Best| No Matter What His Starting Point Is.  The School'S Vision In Raising Passionate Learners Stems From The Belief That Every Child Should Have An Inquiring Mind| Is Reflective And Collaborative| Communicates Effectively| Is Able To Think Independently And Critically And Takes Responsibility For One'S Actions. Every Child Should Articulate Servitude With A Heart Through Showing Care For Himself| His Family And Others| Showing Commitment By Demonstrating School Core Values| Contributing To School And Community And Being Aware Of National And Global Issues.  The School Employs Four Strategic Thrusts In Its Mission To Inspire Minds And Mould Character: 1. Striving Towards Excellence Through Quality Programmes. 2. Developing Character Through A Whole-School Approach. 3. Growing Competent And Engaged Staff Through Professional Development. 4. Strengthening Partnership Through Collaboration.  At The End His Learning Journey In South View Primary School| A Southvien Will Be A 1.Continual Learner With A Passion To Learn And Innovate|  2.Responsible And Confident Individual Who Is Guided By Core Values| And  3.Concerned Citizen With A Heart To Serve  The School Motto| "With Heart And Mind"| Supports The School'S Vision And Mission By Encouraging Staff And Pupils To Learn| Understand And Practise With An Open And Discerning Mind And To Serve With A Gracious Heart So As To Contribute To Society.  With Its Culture Of Care| Collaboration And Excellence| The School'S Staff And Pupils Are Encouraged To Deepen Their Learning And Be Anchored On Values| With A Focus On Pupils' Needs| Learning Aptitudes And Starting Points. By Instilling A Sense Of Duty| A Sense Of Gratitude And Serving With Humility| The School Aims To Nurture A Future Generation Of Useful And Responsible Citizens.
Special_Sdp_Offered: Energize|Excite|And Exalt! -Learning Through Empowering@Svps Is The School'S Applied Learning Programme (Alp). Through Project Work| Pupils Acquire Project Skills Which Are Taught Progressively From P1 To P6 To Deepen Their Cognitive Engagement Rather Than Focus Only On The Resulting Product. Pupils Also Construct New Knowledge And Learn Beyond The Classroom To Enrich And Extend Their Learning. Pupils Demonstrate Both The 21Cc And Ict Skills And Are Inculcated With A Strong Sense Of Responsibility To Family| Community And The Nation With An Understanding Of Their Roles In Shaping The Nation Through Values In Action.  Svps'S Learning For Life Programme (Llp) Love Dance| Love Life! Is Aimed At Promoting Music| Visual And The Performing Arts. Through Its All-Talent-Passion(Atp) Approach| All Pupils Learn Dance| Music And Art Through Modular Programmes. They Also Learn To Appreciate Different Cultures| And Gain A Better Understanding Of Them. Talented Pupils Join Different Aesthetic Ccas For Dedicated Instruction And Training. Pupils Continue To Pursue Their Passion And  Continue Their Learning As Well As Display Their Skills And Passion On Special Occasions.  'We Love|We Can|We Learn' Is The P1 Transition Programme Unique To Svps. Fostering Children'S Social And Emotional Adjustment| Knowledge| Physical And Life Skills| It Enables Them To Feel Comfortable And Familiar With The School Environment And Expectations. It Involves Families And Recognises The Important Role They Play In Supporting Children And Staff To Make School An Exciting And Engaging Place. It Also Focuses On Identifying And Bridging The Differences Between Children'S Prior-To-School Experiences| Supporting Their Overall Development.  The Innochef Programme Allows All Pupils To Go Through Cooking Lessons Which Are Integrated With Other Subjects.It Promotes The Value Of Healthy Eating Through Experiential And Fully Hands-On Lessons| Involveing Pupils In Activities Which Are Multi-Disciplinary In Nature.

First_Vp_Name: Mdm Siti Nazrah Bte Abdul Rahman
Visionstatement_Desc: A Caring And Vibrant Learning Community With Opportunities For All To Excel.
Missionstatement_Desc: Every Pasirian Is Nurtured To Be A Confident| Passionate And Self-Directed Learner Who Is Anchored In Values.
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: We Believe That - Every Child Is A Winner. - Every Child Can Learn And Achieve To The Maximum Of His Potential Given The Proper Guidance And Nurturing. - As Teachers|  We Are In The Business Of Enhancing Lives. - We Make A Great Difference In Every Child'S Behaviour|  Motivation And Achievement. - By Keeping Fit And By Taking Care Of Our Own Health And Professional Growth|  We Can Contribute More To Our Children'S Growth And Development.  - Parents Are Our Partners-In-Education.  We Will Work Closely With Parents And The Community To Achieve Our Mission Of Preparing Our Children For The Challenges Of The Future.
Special_Sdp_Offered: Learning For Life Programme (Llp) - Ilead Programme Pasir Ris Primary Believes That There Is Student Leadership Potential In Every Child. The School Adopts A Progressive 2-Pronged Approach That Aims To Develop Student Leadership For All Students And Segmented Group Of Student Leaders. Students Are Given Opportunities To Embark On Projects That Focus On Societal Concerns Of Their Choice To Equip Themselves With Problem-Solving And Decision-Making Skills To Generate Solutions Creatively.  Students Learn That Everyone Has A Part To Play In Being Active And Concerned Citizens While Making The School And The Community A Better Place For Everyone.  I-Series Programme Pri 3 To Pri 5 Students Are Given Varied Learning Experiences That Can Bring Out Their Strengths| Interests And Talents In Four Domains - Aesthetics| Cognitive| Leadership And Physical. Teachers' Observation| Students' Feedback And Self-Assessment Are Collected At The End Of Each Module To Provide Useful Information About Each Student'S Strengths| Interests And Talents. These Information Help Students Recognise What They Are Good At And Facilitate Discussions On Choices Of Future Secondary Schools And Career Aspirations.

First_Vp_Name: Mdm Siti Rashidah Bte Abdul Rahman
Visionstatement_Desc: Empowered Learners| Creative Minds.
Missionstatement_Desc: Nurturing Creative And Values-Driven Leaders To Be Contributing Citizens
Philosophy_Culture_Ethos: Our School'S Vision "Empowered Learners| Creative Minds" Espouses The Desire To Nurture Our Students To Be Confident| Creative| Conscientious And Caring Citizens (5Cs). In Working Towards Achieving These 5Cs| We Firmly Believe That Students Need To Be Equipped With Knowledge| Life Skills And 21St Century Competencies (21Cc) For Success In School And In Life.
